Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0160127/","name":"Charlie's Angels","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGI1NTM5MTItNDcxMS00YTIwLTg1NjUtNzE5ZGE5NDkxMmU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0160127/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"moonspinner55","dateCreated":"2005-06-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"High-spirited, infectious ridiculousness","reviewBody":"Head-spinning collage of technically marvelous effects in theatrical remake of cult late-'70s TV series. Drew Barrymore, Cameron Diaz and Lucy Lui are attractive, funny, resourceful, sexy and--most importantly (and surprisingly) quite convincing as super-detectives. Their case (involving rival software companies, a kidnapping, and the planned assassination of boss Charlie) doesn't make a whole lot of sense, and Bill Murray is out-of-it as confidante Bosley, but director McG's modern-comic action is so lightning-fast and silky smooth you may be having too much fun to notice. Some of the satire is actually rather smart, and the girls are game for just about anything. **1/2 from ****","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":182862,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2001-01-17","keywords":"martial arts,undercover agent,based on tv series,spy,secret agent","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Charlie's Angels","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1029678105","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2VjNmUxNWQtNzk4ZC00NzE3LThlZDYtODc0YjAwZTA5ODE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2VjNmUxNWQtNzk4ZC00NzE3LThlZDYtODc0YjAwZTA5ODE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Charlie's Angels","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000106/","name":"Drew Barrymore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005154/","name":"Lucy Liu"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629334/","name":"McG"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0148520/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0089889/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746598/","name":"Ryan Rowe","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004412/","name":"Ed Solomon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0041864/","name":"John August"],"duration":"PT1H38M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
Legenda o vitezu
programme.desc: A Knight's Tale: Directed by Brian Helgeland. With Heath Ledger, Rufus Sewell, Shannyn Sossamon, Paul Bettany. After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0183790/","name":"A Knight's Tale","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTE5OTE4OTE2Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMDkzMTQ3._V1_.jpg","description":"After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0183790/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Danny_kahn"},"dateCreated":"2005-02-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining","reviewBody":"This comment is to counter those who have issue with modern rock and other time problems being in this movie. This movie was designed to entertain. It was NOT a historical piece and nowhere does it claim to be one. This is the story of a boy who aspires to be more than what society set out for him. The movie uses odd references to history's great figures and humor to bring its story across to the viewer. So I say that, for those of you who cannot enjoy a piece of entertainment due to its well placed use of anachronisms, I strongly suggest you stay away from any of Shakespeare's works. (Not to say that this movie was on level with Shakespeare...) The makers of "A Knight's Tale" set out to entertain, and did so dutifully.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":180335,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Romance"],"datePublished":"2001-10-24","keywords":"medieval times,knight,jousting,london england,chaucer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Knight's Tale","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2427715865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDkxMzRmODYtOTRmMy00ZjQwLTk4MjAtNDQ5YjQ2NTZjZDgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDkxMzRmODYtOTRmMy00ZjQwLTk4MjAtNDQ5YjQ2NTZjZDgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005132/","name":"Heath Ledger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004692/","name":"Mark Addy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001722/","name":"Rufus Sewell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001338/","name":"Brian Helgeland"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035535/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031304/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001338/","name":"Brian Helgeland"}],"duration":"PT2H12M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Tian di ying xiong
Ratnici neba i zemlje
programme.desc: Tian di ying xiong: Directed by Ping He. With Wen Jiang, Kiichi Nakai, Xueqi Wang, Wei Zhao. A Chinese emissary is sent to the Gobi desert to execute a renegade soldier. When a caravan transporting a Buddhist monk and a valuable treasure is threatened by thieves, however, the two warriors might unite to protect the travelers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0374330/","name":"Tian di ying xiong","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMxMjQ2MzI3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjM2NjYyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Chinese emissary is sent to the Gobi desert to execute a renegade soldier. When a caravan transporting a Buddhist monk and a valuable treasure is threatened by thieves, however, the two warriors might unite to protect the travelers","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0374330/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gnosis1"},"dateCreated":"2004-04-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Incredible. Best movie I have seen in a long time.","reviewBody":"This movie is the story of an Imperial Agent sent to bring to justice a murderer, his final mission before he is allowed to go home to his family in Japan. The murderer, a former army officer accused of mutiny when he refused to kill a group of women and children. The movie is the tale of their trek across the desert fighting against each other and with each other. The dialog was great, short and delivered impeccably by an incredible cast of characters. It has been a long while since I have seen such thoughtful, dramatic acting. The movie is shot mostly in the desert but it is all done beautifully and with exactly the right tone and feel. I enjoyed the period costumes and the fight scenes were extremely well choreographed. It is seldom that I watch a hollywood movie and come away feeling satisfied, I can only hope that Asia continues to pump out incredible movies like this one and that Hollywood will wise up and stop trying to feed me drivel like the Last Samurai.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4213,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2003-09-23","keywords":"ancient china,8th century,tang dynasty,turkic,soldier","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Warriors of Heaven and Earth","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4225827097","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWE1ZDY1NTYtYWU0Yi00ODZhLTg0OTEtZmFjZjY5MjFkNTBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWE1ZDY1NTYtYWU0Yi00ODZhLTg0OTEtZmFjZjY5MjFkNTBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0422638/","name":"Wen Jiang"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0620018/","name":"Kiichi Nakai"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1281653/","name":"Xueqi Wang"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0372092/","name":"Ping He"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0292901/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0099734/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047123/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0258268/","name":"Richard Epcar"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0372092/","name":"Ping He"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0955399/","name":"Rui Zhang"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 123
Otmica metroa 123
programme.desc: The Taking of Pelham 123: Directed by Tony Scott. With Denzel Washington, John Travolta, Luis Guzmán, Victor Gojcaj. Armed men hijack a New York City subway train, holding the passengers hostage in return for a ransom, and turning an ordinary day's work for dispatcher Walter Garber into a face-off with the mastermind behind the crime." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1111422/","name":"The Taking of Pelham 123","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3NzA4MDcwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDAyNzc1Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Armed men hijack a New York City subway train, holding the passengers hostage in return for a ransom, and turning an ordinary day's work for dispatcher Walter Garber into a face-off with the mastermind behind the crime.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1111422/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tvspace"},"dateCreated":"2009-06-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"A good, tense heist thriller","reviewBody":"A surprisingly enjoyable and tense thriller. While it does have a good bit of the kind of silly excess that ruins most summer blockbuster movies anymore, those flaws are overshadowed by the tightly-wound script and a couple of good performances from Denzel Washington and John Travolta. Director Tony Scott seems to have spent a good bit of effort trying to channel the spirit of 1970's American movies, and often this pays dividends as the focus on grittiness over spectacular action sequences ups the suspense. It's interesting that as the movie approaches the end you can feel the director's 21st century comic-book instincts straining against the genre he's working in as the story becomes increasingly less believable and more "heroic." \n\nNevertheless I can recommend this movie to anyone who enjoys a suspenseful action movie that doesn't beat you over the head with histrionics from beginning to end. Admittedly I've never seen the original, and I can easily imagine those who love it might be substantially less enthusiastic about this remake.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":192648,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2009-06-10","keywords":"man wears eyeglasses,woman wears eyeglasses,train,hostage,subway","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Taking of Pelham 123: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1348535065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTQ4Mjc4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk4MTgyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTQ4Mjc4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk4MTgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Armed men hijack a New York City subway train, holding the passengers hostage in return for a ransom, and turning an ordinary day's work for dispatcher Walter Garbe (Washington) into a face-off with the mastermind behind the crime (Travolta)."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000237/","name":"John Travolta"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0350079/","name":"Luis Guzmán"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001716/","name":"Tony Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001338/","name":"Brian Helgeland"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0323945/","name":"John Godey"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0072251, Title: The Taking of Pelham 123, --- Description: The Taking of Pelham 123: Directed by Tony Scott. With Denzel Washington, John Travolta, Luis Guzmán, Victor Gojcaj. Armed men hijack a New York City subway train, holding the passengers hostage in return for a ransom, and turning an ordinary day's work for dispatcher Walter Garber into a face-off with the mastermind behind the crime." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1111422/","name":"The Taking of Pelham 123","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3NzA4MDcwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDAyNzc1Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Armed men hijack a New York City subway train, holding the passengers hostage in return for a ransom, and turning an ordinary day's work for dispatcher Walter Garber into a face-off with the mastermind behind the crime.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1111422/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"tvspace","dateCreated":"2009-06-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"A good, tense heist thriller","reviewBody":"A surprisingly enjoyable and tense thriller. While it does have a good bit of the kind of silly excess that ruins most summer blockbuster movies anymore, those flaws are overshadowed by the tightly-wound script and a couple of good performances from Denzel Washington and John Travolta. Director Tony Scott seems to have spent a good bit of effort trying to channel the spirit of 1970's American movies, and often this pays dividends as the focus on grittiness over spectacular action sequences ups the suspense. It's interesting that as the movie approaches the end you can feel the director's 21st century comic-book instincts straining against the genre he's working in as the story becomes increasingly less believable and more "heroic." \n\nNevertheless I can recommend this movie to anyone who enjoys a suspenseful action movie that doesn't beat you over the head with histrionics from beginning to end. Admittedly I've never seen the original, and I can easily imagine those who love it might be substantially less enthusiastic about this remake.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":192648,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2009-06-10","keywords":"man wears eyeglasses,woman wears eyeglasses,train,hostage,subway","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Taking of Pelham 123: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1348535065","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTQ4Mjc4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk4MTgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTQ4Mjc4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk4MTgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Armed men hijack a New York City subway train, holding the passengers hostage in return for a ransom, and turning an ordinary day's work for dispatcher Walter Garbe (Washington) into a face-off with the mastermind behind the crime (Travolta).","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000237/","name":"John Travolta","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0350079/","name":"Luis Guzmán"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001716/","name":"Tony Scott"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001338/","name":"Brian Helgeland","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0323945/","name":"John Godey"],"duration":"PT1H46M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
Charliejevi anđeli
programme.desc: Charlie's Angels: Directed by McG. With Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu, Bill Murray. Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0160127/","name":"Charlie's Angels","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGI1NTM5MTItNDcxMS00YTIwLTg1NjUtNzE5ZGE5NDkxMmU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0160127/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"moonspinner55"},"dateCreated":"2005-06-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"High-spirited, infectious ridiculousness","reviewBody":"Head-spinning collage of technically marvelous effects in theatrical remake of cult late-'70s TV series. Drew Barrymore, Cameron Diaz and Lucy Lui are attractive, funny, resourceful, sexy and--most importantly (and surprisingly) quite convincing as super-detectives. Their case (involving rival software companies, a kidnapping, and the planned assassination of boss Charlie) doesn't make a whole lot of sense, and Bill Murray is out-of-it as confidante Bosley, but director McG's modern-comic action is so lightning-fast and silky smooth you may be having too much fun to notice. Some of the satire is actually rather smart, and the girls are game for just about anything. **1/2 from ****","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":182862,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2001-01-17","keywords":"martial arts,undercover agent,based on tv series,spy,secret agent","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Charlie's Angels","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1029678105","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2VjNmUxNWQtNzk4ZC00NzE3LThlZDYtODc0YjAwZTA5ODE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2VjNmUxNWQtNzk4ZC00NzE3LThlZDYtODc0YjAwZTA5ODE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Charlie's Angels"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000106/","name":"Drew Barrymore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005154/","name":"Lucy Liu"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629334/","name":"McG"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0148520/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0089889/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746598/","name":"Ryan Rowe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004412/","name":"Ed Solomon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0041864/","name":"John August"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

A family-owned hotel in the fictional coastal Spanish town of Cantaloa in 1905: love, blackmail, jealousies, crime, comedy, and plots and counter-plots all involving the hotel's owners, guests, detectives, and residential employees." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2006421/","name":"Gran Hotel","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTk2MjQyNTAzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODI3OTM3MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A family-owned hotel in the fictional coastal Spanish town of Cantaloa in 1905: love, blackmail, jealousies, crime, comedy, and plots and counter-plots all involving the hotel's owners, guests, detectives, and residential employees.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2006421/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"iammelba"},"dateCreated":"2018-06-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Couldn't stop at just one episode.","reviewBody":"This show is sooooooo addicting. programme.title: Mornarički specijalci
programme.desc: Navy SEAL američka je serija o članovima najelitnije specijalne jedinice koji kreću u opasne misije boreći se protiv terorizma. Navy SEAL serija je o pripadnicima najelitnije specijalne jedinice koji kreću u opasne i riskantne misije u koje ih domovina šalje. Njihov je cilj uništiti terorizam, a tim dobro obučenih vojnika suočava se s time svakodnevno.Uz napete trenutke ove serije, saznajte ishod tajnih misija ovih hrabrih vojnika!

programme.desc: Dokumentarna serija "Tehnološke igračke" vodi vas u svijet tehnologije, upoznaje gledatelje pred malim ekranima s mnogim prometnim inovacijama. Dokumentarna serija "Tehnološke igračke" vodi vas u svijet tehnologije, upoznaje gledatelje pred malim ekranima s mnogim prometnim inovacijama. programme.title: Last Resort
Posljednje utočište
programme.desc: Last Resort: Created by Karl Gajdusek, Shawn Ryan. With Andre Braugher, Scott Speedman, Daisy Betts, Camille De Pazzis. A US sub picks up Navy SEALs and receives an order for a nuke launch. Due to the circumstances of the order, the Captain refuses to fire. After escaping an attack from another US sub, the crew and SEALs take refuge on a small island." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2172103/","name":"Last Resort","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYyNDcwNjA1Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2Nzc4NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A US sub picks up Navy SEALs and receives an order for a nuke launch. Due to the circumstances of the order, the Captain refuses to fire. After escaping an attack from another US sub, the crew and SEALs take refuge on a small island.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2172103/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ozfan-1"},"dateCreated":"2012-10-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Don't Let This Show Die, It Is AWESOME!","reviewBody":"I started watching this show on my I-Phone ABC television app during my lunch break at work. I was floored by the action and excitement of the show. Even on that tiny screen the drama was palpable, so much so I was nearly late going back to work. I am totally impressed with this show. All of the characters are interesting and the cast is excellent. This is a show that keeps my interest and I look forward to the next episode. Unfortunately, the ratings have not been very good and there is a good chance it might not last the season. I URGE my readers to watch this show. I don't think the networks give shows like this a chance. Even I would probably have overlooked it had I not committed to reviewing all the new fall shows. I am not drawn to military drama but this show is not just military drama. There is intrigue, romance, conflict and much more. ABC does have a winner here and I encourage them to stick with this show. WATCH IT!!!!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21480,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2012-09-27","keywords":"island","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0105672/","name":"Andre Braugher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005454/","name":"Scott Speedman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2237408/","name":"Daisy Betts"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0394745/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0177102/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086397/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2244980/","name":"Karl Gajdusek"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0752841/","name":"Shawn Ryan"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Last Resort","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3082920473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDgzMDUxODM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTY5MDAzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDgzMDUxODM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTY5MDAzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"From executive producer/writer Shawn Ryan (The Shield, The Unit, The Chicago Code) and Executive producer/writer Karl Gajdusek comes this dramatic new international action-thriller about treachery, treason, and nuclear brinksmanship. LAST RESORT contemplates establishing of a new society in the modern world, and character becomes everything when unthinkable decisions must be made. "}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Last Resort
Posljednje utočište
programme.desc: Last Resort: Created by Karl Gajdusek, Shawn Ryan. With Andre Braugher, Scott Speedman, Daisy Betts, Camille De Pazzis. A US sub picks up Navy SEALs and receives an order for a nuke launch. Due to the circumstances of the order, the Captain refuses to fire. After escaping an attack from another US sub, the crew and SEALs take refuge on a small island." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2172103/","name":"Last Resort","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYyNDcwNjA1Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2Nzc4NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A US sub picks up Navy SEALs and receives an order for a nuke launch. Due to the circumstances of the order, the Captain refuses to fire. After escaping an attack from another US sub, the crew and SEALs take refuge on a small island.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2172103/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ozfan-1"},"dateCreated":"2012-10-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Don't Let This Show Die, It Is AWESOME!","reviewBody":"I started watching this show on my I-Phone ABC television app during my lunch break at work. I was floored by the action and excitement of the show. Even on that tiny screen the drama was palpable, so much so I was nearly late going back to work. I am totally impressed with this show. All of the characters are interesting and the cast is excellent. This is a show that keeps my interest and I look forward to the next episode. Unfortunately, the ratings have not been very good and there is a good chance it might not last the season. I URGE my readers to watch this show. I don't think the networks give shows like this a chance. Even I would probably have overlooked it had I not committed to reviewing all the new fall shows. I am not drawn to military drama but this show is not just military drama. There is intrigue, romance, conflict and much more. ABC does have a winner here and I encourage them to stick with this show. WATCH IT!!!!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21480,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2012-09-27","keywords":"island","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0105672/","name":"Andre Braugher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005454/","name":"Scott Speedman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2237408/","name":"Daisy Betts"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0394745/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0177102/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086397/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2244980/","name":"Karl Gajdusek"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0752841/","name":"Shawn Ryan"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Last Resort","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3082920473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDgzMDUxODM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTY5MDAzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDgzMDUxODM5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTY5MDAzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"From executive producer/writer Shawn Ryan (The Shield, The Unit, The Chicago Code) and Executive producer/writer Karl Gajdusek comes this dramatic new international action-thriller about treachery, treason, and nuclear brinksmanship. LAST RESORT contemplates establishing of a new society in the modern world, and character becomes everything when unthinkable decisions must be made. "}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Gran Hotel
Grand Hotel
programme.desc: Gran Hotel: With Adriana Ozores, Amaia Salamanca, Yon González, Eloy Azorín. A family-owned hotel in the fictional coastal Spanish town of Cantaloa in 1905: love, blackmail, jealousies, crime, comedy, and plots and counter-plots all involving the hotel's owners, guests, detectives, and residential employees." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2006421/","name":"Gran Hotel","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTk2MjQyNTAzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODI3OTM3MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A family-owned hotel in the fictional coastal Spanish town of Cantaloa in 1905: love, blackmail, jealousies, crime, comedy, and plots and counter-plots all involving the hotel's owners, guests, detectives, and residential employees.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2006421/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"iammelba"},"dateCreated":"2018-06-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Couldn't stop at just one episode.","reviewBody":"This show is sooooooo addicting. The twists and turns throughout every single episode leaves you sitting on the edge of your seat. The show is so riveting that you forget you're reading subtitles. And just when I thought I had every character figured out, another twist happens. \n\nI enjoyed this series so much that I just may go back and watch it all again.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":10000,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2011-10-04","keywords":"telenovela,spain","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654841/","name":"Adriana Ozores"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2319146/","name":"Amaia Salamanca"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2304398/","name":"Yon González"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0249391/"}]}</script><metacontent="

Mornarički specijalci

programme.title: Mornarički specijalci
programme.desc: Navy SEAL američka je serija o članovima najelitnije specijalne jedinice koji kreću u opasne misije boreći se protiv terorizma. Navy SEAL serija je o pripadnicima najelitnije specijalne jedinice koji kreću u opasne i riskantne misije u koje ih domovina šalje. Njihov je cilj uništiti terorizam, a tim dobro obučenih vojnika suočava se s time svakodnevno.Uz napete trenutke ove serije, saznajte ishod tajnih misija ovih hrabrih vojnika!

The spinoff series of Bad Boys films focuses on drug enforcement agent Sydney Burnett, now working for the Los Angeles Police Department." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7555294/","name":"L.A.'s Finest","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjVlMzZkMTYtYjFiYy00Njc4LTk2NmMtYmRhZjJmZjcxNDg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The spinoff series of Bad Boys films focuses on drug enforcement agent Sydney Burnett, now working for the Los Angeles Police Department.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7555294/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ladywriter56"},"dateCreated":"2019-06-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pretty good","reviewBody":"After reading all the negative reviews on this I'm wondering what exactly does today's audience want in a cop series? More sex, language, unreal car chases? Less plot and enough action sequences in one episode to give your brain an epileptic seizure? After getting hooked on fun, entertaining shows like The Good Cop and Battle Creek only to have them cancelled after one season, I give up trying to figure out today's viewers. No, LA's Finest isn't perfect (or totally realistic, but hey, what show is?). Yet it's pretty engaging. The story lines keep me coming back for more episodes and I think the acting is pretty good. programme.desc: Kad nestalog časnika MI6 povežu s ubijenim mornaričkim dočasnikom, Gibbs šalje Quinn i Bishop u Philadelphiju da surađuju s časnikom MI6 Claytonom Reevesom. Uz to, Quinn s mukom opisuje slučaj Navy... Kad nestalog časnika MI6 povežu s ubijenim mornaričkim dočasnikom, Gibbs šalje Quinn i Bishop u Philadelphiju da surađuju s časnikom MI6 Claytonom Reevesom. Uz to, Quinn s mukom opisuje slučaj Navy CIS-a zbog kojeg je prestala raditi na terenu.

programme.title: Navy CIS
programme.desc: Nakon što mornarička dočasnica uspije pobjeći svojem otmičaru, Navy CIS otkriva da to ima neke veze s njezinim nestalim suprugom. Uz to, Abby u Navy CIS-u plete personalizirane darove za nove članove... Nakon što mornarička dočasnica uspije pobjeći svojem otmičaru, Navy CIS otkriva da to ima neke veze s njezinim nestalim suprugom. programme.desc: L.A.'s Finest: Created by Brandon Margolis, Brandon Sonnier. With Jessica Alba, Gabrielle Union, Duane Martin, Zach Gilford. The spinoff series of Bad Boys films focuses on drug enforcement agent Sydney Burnett, now working for the Los Angeles Police Department." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7555294/","name":"L.A.'s Finest","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjVlMzZkMTYtYjFiYy00Njc4LTk2NmMtYmRhZjJmZjcxNDg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The spinoff series of Bad Boys films focuses on drug enforcement agent Sydney Burnett, now working for the Los Angeles Police Department.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7555294/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ladywriter56"},"dateCreated":"2019-06-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pretty good","reviewBody":"After reading all the negative reviews on this I'm wondering what exactly does today's audience want in a cop series? More sex, language, unreal car chases? Less plot and enough action sequences in one episode to give your brain an epileptic seizure? After getting hooked on fun, entertaining shows like The Good Cop and Battle Creek only to have them cancelled after one season, I give up trying to figure out today's viewers. No, LA's Finest isn't perfect (or totally realistic, but hey, what show is?). Yet it's pretty engaging. The story lines keep me coming back for more episodes and I think the acting is pretty good. programme.title: Navy CIS
programme.desc: Kad nestalog časnika MI6 povežu s ubijenim mornaričkim dočasnikom, Gibbs šalje Quinn i Bishop u Philadelphiju da surađuju s časnikom MI6 Claytonom Reevesom. Uz to, Quinn s mukom opisuje slučaj Navy... Kad nestalog časnika MI6 povežu s ubijenim mornaričkim dočasnikom, Gibbs šalje Quinn i Bishop u Philadelphiju da surađuju s časnikom MI6 Claytonom Reevesom. Uz to, Quinn s mukom opisuje slučaj Navy CIS-a zbog kojeg je prestala raditi na terenu.

programme.title: Navy CIS
programme.desc: Nakon što mornarička dočasnica uspije pobjeći svojem otmičaru, Navy CIS otkriva da to ima neke veze s njezinim nestalim suprugom. Uz to, Abby u Navy CIS-u plete personalizirane darove za nove članove... Nakon što mornarička dočasnica uspije pobjeći svojem otmičaru, Navy CIS otkriva da to ima neke veze s njezinim nestalim suprugom. Uz to, Abby u Navy CIS-u plete personalizirane darove za nove članove ekipe.

programme.title: McQueen
McQueen
programme.desc: McQueen: Directed by Ian Bonhôte, Peter Ettedgui. With Alexander McQueen, Joyce McQueen, John Hitchcock, Danny Hall. The life and career of fashion designer Lee Alexander McQueen: from his start as a tailor, to launching and overseeing his eponymous line and his untimely death." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6510332/","name":"McQueen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0MTg3MTM0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTU0OTU2NTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The life and career of fashion designer Lee Alexander McQueen: from his start as a tailor, to launching and overseeing his eponymous line and his untimely death.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6510332/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"drewpkerr"},"dateCreated":"2018-09-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"McQueen Makes The Cut","reviewBody":"Less of a fashion spectacle and more of a tale of the label's namesake himself, McQueen is a riveting story from start to finish. From humble beginnings to the height of success, the documentary delivers a captivating recount of Lee Alexander McQueens foray into fashion. For anyone who goes to see McQueen, they will be thankful that we lived in a time where history can be recorded for review. The documentary uncovers insider footage from the early days at St Martin's design school through to his final showing. A group of individuals who all were involved in McQueens life to some extent it another provide a wholistic and collective view of the troubled artist. The sequential nature of the documentary worked incredibly well and the sensibility of all those interviewed showed that there really was no need to embellish McQueen's life. A film for fashion and art lovers as much as a film for those who seek inspiration every day.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7840,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Documentary","Biography"],"datePublished":"2018-06-08","keywords":"fashion,fashion designer,fashion show,workaholic,dog lover","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi194427673","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTlhM2MxMzQtYjllMC00YmYxLWI2NmQtZjNjOGNkMzRmMjAwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTlhM2MxMzQtYjllMC00YmYxLWI2NmQtZjNjOGNkMzRmMjAwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A documentary on fashion designer Alexander McQueen."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1195539/","name":"Alexander McQueen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10032991/","name":"Joyce McQueen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm12782134/","name":"John Hitchcock"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0094524/","name":"Ian Bonhôte"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0262167/","name":"Peter Ettedgui"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0620053/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0412130/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0450149/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0262167/","name":"Peter Ettedgui"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Defiance
Prkos
programme.desc:
Defiance: Directed by Edward Zwick. With Daniel Craig, Liev Schreiber, Jamie Bell, Alexa Davalos. Jewish brothers in Nazi-occupied Eastern Europe escape into the Belarussian forests, where they join Russian resistance fighters, and endeavor to build a village, in order to protect themselves and about one thousand Jewish non-combatants." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1034303/","name":"Defiance","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjEyYjk4ZDQtZDhjMi00NGFkLWExM2UtZjgyMDMxODgwNjgyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jewish brothers in Nazi-occupied Eastern Europe escape into the Belarussian forests, where they join Russian resistance fighters, and endeavor to build a village, in order to protect themselves and about one thousand Jewish non-comba","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1034303/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"JoeytheBrit"},"dateCreated":"2009-12-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Belorussian band of brothers...","reviewBody":"Although I'm not a religious type and know little of any details from the stories of the bible, the parallels this old-fashioned adventure story draws with Moses leading the chosen are unmistakable (although the events depicted here - based on fact, apparently - are on an undeniably smaller scale: instead of a parting of the Red Sea we get a wade through marshland).

Such lofty aspirations leave Ed Zwick's film open to questions about the wisdom of such a decision at best, and ridicule at worst. Needless to say, it's best to take the film's claims of authenticity with a pinch of salt and perhaps to overlook the pretentiousness at its core.

At the end of the day, Defiance is an old-fashioned war film that could easily have been made back in the forties or fifties. The story has been told a thousand times in a thousand different forms, and its' familiarity means the long running time becomes something of a chore. Daniel Craig and Liev Schreiber give a good account of themselves as the brothers who find themselves leading a band of Jewish refugees from the Nazis, but the complexities of their relationship are only touched upon, meaning that key moments such as Zus's decision to join the Russian partisans seem to come out of the blue, with no accumulation of incidents to justify his choice.

Most other characters, other than Jamie Bell as the youngest brother, are genre stereotypes: the Jewish teacher, the Jewish intellectual, the stern Russian commander, etc, which lends the entire thing a 'by the numbers' feel that means the audience is never as involved in the refugee's plight as they ought to be. The film has its moments, and often looks beautiful, but you'll watch the end credits with the feeling that you've seen it all before."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":143978,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2009-10-21","keywords":"firearm,nazi soldier,nazi officer,british actor playing foreigner,nazi uniform","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Defiance: Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2692481049","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcyMDUzNzI1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODU4Njg5MQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcyMDUzNzI1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODU4Njg5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the theatrical trailer for Defiance, directed by Edward Zwick"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0185819/","name":"Daniel Craig"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000630/","name":"Liev Schreiber"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0068260/","name":"Jamie Bell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001880/","name":"Edward Zwick"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0179341/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103800/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014925/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0296243/","name":"Clayton Frohman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001880/","name":"Edward Zwick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2739958/","name":"Nechama Tec"}],"duration":"PT2H17M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: An Invisible Sign
Matematika ljubavi
programme.desc:
An Invisible Sign: Directed by Marilyn Agrelo. With Jessica Alba, Chris Messina, Sônia Braga, John Shea. Mona Gray is a 20-year-old loner who turned to math for salvation as a child after her father became ill. As an adult she now teaches the subject and helps her students through their own crises." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1212454/","name":"An Invisible Sign","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwNTgzMDgxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzAxMzcwMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Mona Gray is a 20-year-old loner who turned to math for salvation as a child after her father became ill. As an adult she now teaches the subject and helps her students through their own crises.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1212454/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"francishooks"},"dateCreated":"2011-05-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"The precise moment I knew I didn't like this film....","reviewBody":"Jessica Alba's character and cut-price Mark Ruffallo tribute act guy are at the movies. They're both talking over the film being "kooky" and "charming".

Some guy behind them asks them to stop talking. Ruffalo-lite tells him to get another seat, throws popcorn at him and then nearly starts a fight with him.

I mean, c'mon! Do they honestly think that movie fans watching the film are gonna warm to that kind of a-holeish behaviour?! They're both talking over the film being "kooky" and "charming".

I mean, c'mon! Do they honestly think that movie fans watching the film are gonna warm to that kind of a-holeish behaviour?! programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
Srednja škola: Najgore razdoblje mog života
programme.desc:
Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life: Directed by Steve Carr. With Griffin Gluck, Lauren Graham, Alexa Nisenson, Andrew Daly. After his principal (Andy Daly) destroys his sketchbook, Rafe (Griffin Gluck) and his best friend Leo (Thomas Barbusca) decide to "destroy his book" and break every rule in the school's Code of Conduct." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4981636/","name":"Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjQzMTczNjI0Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODY5MTY5OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After his principal (Andy Daly) destroys his sketchbook, Rafe (Griffin Gluck) and his best friend Leo (Thomas Barbusca) decide to "destroy his book" and break every rule in the school's Code of Conduct.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4981636/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"goolizap"},"dateCreated":"2016-11-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Twizard Rating: 89","reviewBody":"As I've said a thousand times before, the lack of live-action comedies for the younger members of our society saddens me. In the '90s, when I grew up, you couldn't get away from them. It was awesome. But nowadays, pre-teens' only options for movies are of the superhero variety. Or some other big budget franchise. Unless they merely want to watch animated films with characters that aren't human. And I'm not knocking computer animation. It's just that during a time when empathy is getting further and further away, it's nice for kids to see "tangible" characters that they can actually relate to.

And there have been some good live-action options for kids semi-lately. The Diary of a Wimpy Kid series, for example, was perfect. But many others dumb themselves down for children. And when this happens, you lose the parents as well.

Middle School isn't like that. It's full of quality humor and an engaging storyline that will find both kids and adults laughing out loud--the latter might even be surprised with how much they like it.

The film follows Rafe (Griffin Gluck), a middle schooler who's been inexplicably kicked out of his previous two schools. His active imagination, along with problems with authority, get him into trouble. Especially at his new school, where the principal (Andrew Daly) acts as a warden, creating asinine rules. The kids aren't allowed to talk in the hallways, wear colorful clothes, or even draw pictures.

Rafe isn't having any of this nonsense and wages a war with his principal in a Home Alone-type of way. It's highly entertaining seeing what he comes up with and how his life progresses with those around him, including his best friend, Leo (Thomas Barbusca), his sister Georgia (Alexa Nisenson), and his cool insouciant teacher, Mr. Teller (Adam Pally).

And with the quality talents of Rob Riggle, who plays Rafe's borderline-abusive future stepfather, and Daly, Middle School has humor for young and old.

Yeah, the script has some issues with a couple of jarring tonal shifts, but it also refreshingly surprises us when we least expect it.

I have a hard time knocking a film that does its job. It never talks down to kids--in fact, it gets kids all too well. There isn't some over-exaggeration of how much they use their phones. Even the banter feels lifelike. It speaks to adolescents who are at that "middle" stage between childhood and responsibility-hood. It's a fun time that most of us took for granted. But Middle School pleasantly brings us back so we can live it over again with Rafe--in a stunningly committed first-person narrative.

This film isn't just going through the motions, folks. There's a lot of genuine intent throughout. Plot points and jokes that are obviously very well meditated upon. While sitting and watching this movie, I legitimately thought to myself, "This isn't just a moneymaker for them--they actually want it to be good." Even if it were among the other classic live-action kid films of yesteryear, I would still go out of my way to watch it. I wish I had this movie when I was growing up. But at least I have it now.

Twizard Rating: 89","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8617,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2016-10-07","keywords":"mother son relationship,brother sister relationship,slimehouse,middle school,teenager","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Read Along Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2163783449","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzMjMxMjY1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzYwNDczOTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzMjMxMjY1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzYwNDczOTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A quiet teenage artist Rafe Katchadorian has a wild imagination and is sick of middle school and the rules that have been put before him. Rafe and his best friend Leo have come up with a plan: break every rule in the school hand book and as you expect trouble follows."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3838034/","name":"Griffin Gluck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0334179/","name":"Lauren Graham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6835961/","name":"Alexa Nisenson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139867/","name":"Steve Carr"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047306/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0258914/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0132772/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0101302/","name":"Chris Bowman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1376062/","name":"Hubbel Palmer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1289517/","name":"Kara Holden"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
Indijski začin na francuski način
programme.desc:
The Hundred-Foot Journey: Directed by Lasse Hallström. With Helen Mirren, Om Puri, Manish Dayal, Charlotte Le Bon. The Kadam family leaves India for France where they open a restaurant directly across the road from Madame Mallory's Michelin-starred eatery." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2980648/","name":"The Hundred-Foot Journey","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3Mjg2MTE4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzcyNDMwMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Kadam family leaves India for France where they open a restaurant directly across the road from Madame Mallory's Michelin-starred eatery.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2980648/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dnbonthenet"},"dateCreated":"2014-08-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Among the most refreshing movie of recent times","reviewBody":"When I first noticed the ratings on IMDb, my expectations before watching the movie were substantially toned down. I went to the movie with a rather unassuming frame of mind, hoping something good would come out of from the two hours I planned to spend. 

But, I must say that ratings do not hand down the justice the movie deserves. The story is set in south France, and narrates a clash of two beautiful cultures via its respective culinary grandeur. Further embellished into the story line are two very beautiful actors. Overall, the movie leaves a very refreshing taste in the end. The entire movie has a very subtle and harmonious tone, with no significant ups or downs, clash or surprises. Its a very easy to watch, light movie that can be enjoyed with the entire family. 

I feel this movie presents an excellent characterization of the type of globalization our society has come to bear. Unfortunately, as embodied by the reviews and ratings, it appears the western audience is not yet ready to embrace a non-western, non-Caucasian actors. I hope this changes soon.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80154,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-08-08","keywords":"restaurant,cooking,chef,haute cuisine,interracial romance","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3660426521","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI0NDA2NjU4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjExOTEzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI0NDA2NjU4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjExOTEzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A story centered on an Indian family who moves to France and opens a restaurant across the street from a Michelin-starred French restaurant.
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000545/","name":"Helen Mirren"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0700875/","name":"Om Puri"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2110485/","name":"Manish Dayal"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002120/","name":"Lasse Hallström"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004231/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1140275/","name":"Steven Knight"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5728000/","name":"Richard C. programme.title: Cats and Peachtopia

Now he must decide whether or not to come forward when 142 of them file a lawsuit to reveal his identity." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2387559/","name":"Delivery Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIxNjc2MzMzMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjA5NjM0MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An affable underachiever finds out he's fathered 533 children through anonymous donations to a fertility clinic 20 years ago. Now he must decide whether or not to come forward when 142 of them file a lawsuit to reveal his identity.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2387559/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jacobhadley70"},"dateCreated":"2013-11-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Vince Vaughn did it well","reviewBody":"Coming into this movie I expected a hard core comedy full of Chris Pratt puns and Vince Vaughn One liners, but after watching this movie I saw it as something else. Vince Vaughn just blows it out the waters with an actually heart felt performance, This isn't just a sly comedy but a heart felt family drama where one ordinary man has to come to terms with an unordinary situation and Vaughn does it well and with great help from his co-stars. Definitely worth at least one watch, if not for Vince Vaughn then definitely watch it for Chris Pratt because even if this movie isn't just a straight odd ball comedy it's definitely got it's funny moments and all mostly revolving around Chris Pratt and his Attorney at Law bit.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":77388,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-11-22","keywords":"dreamworks,disney,female police officer,pregnant female police officer,police","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2224400665","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQxMDU0MDM3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI2MjkyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQxMDU0MDM3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI2MjkyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An affable underachiever finds out he's fathered 533 children through anonymous donations to a fertility clinic 20 years ago. programme.title: The Master
Master
programme.desc:
The Master: Directed by Paul Thomas Anderson. With Joaquin Phoenix, Price Carson, Mike Howard, Sarah Shoshana David. A Naval veteran arrives home from war unsettled and uncertain of his future - until he is tantalized by the Cause and its charismatic leader." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1560747/","name":"The Master","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQ5MzMwMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjczNTAzOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Naval veteran arrives home from war unsettled and uncertain of his future - until he is tantalized by the Cause and its charismatic leader.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1560747/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"stingil"},"dateCreated":"2012-08-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Master in action.","reviewBody":"I was fortunate enough to see this film much earlier than most. To me it seems like Anderson is really hitting his stride with this one. It was odd to me that upon exiting the theater the thing that I wondered about most of all is what the hell is he going to do next! 

The Master is not an easy movie to sit through, and at times you don't even know what the movie wants. But then you realize that the movie doesn't want anything. All it asks is for you to observe. More so than his earlier films, "The Master" and "There Will Be Blood" really venture into the realm of the film as being a purely cinematic presentation of a life. Anderson doesn't pass judgment or any point of view, he merely stretches the canvas which allows his characters to speak for themselves. 

Yes, there is a beginning, middle and an end, but is there? Do we really have a sense of catharsis at the end of "There Will Be Blood"? or do we simply understand "man" a little better?

Anderson insisted, as I'm sure he would say the same for this film, that "There Will Be Blood" wasn't a metaphor for anything. It was what it was. No hidden meaning, no sophisticated and often formulaic subtext. It's simply man. As Hoffman's character says in the trailer for "The Master" - "But above all, I am a man".

The movie deals with an interesting idea of the leader vs. the soldier, master vs. slave. It breaks down the anatomy of a relationship so you may interpret it in any way you'd like.

It's beautifully shot on 65/70mm film which is the way I saw it and the way I recommend for you to see it if you get a chance to. Feels almost as if Anderson is giving the finger to the digital revolution by shooting his film on a resolution so high that digital can only dream of getting there in about ten years or so.

The acting and the dialog is superb as you'd expect. Phoenix and Hoffman are on a different level here, especially Phoenix in a role of a life time. There are definitely times in this film that he completely disappears into that role. There is also some great supporting work from Laura Dern and others.

It would be difficult to place this film in his body of work. More than anything it feels like the natural continuation of what he started with "There Will Be Blood". Not to say that he will continue on this path but just that this is definitely a more narrowly focused film than some of his earlier ensemble work. 

I found it to be less engaging than some of his other work and yet there was never a dull moment. You're always on your toes, trying to understand what's going on and where the movie is leading you. 

It really is simply, just like man, a fascinating piece of work.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":165293,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-09-21","keywords":"scientology,past life regression,psychological testing,cult,mentor protege relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1378657561","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUwODYwOTcwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjA5MzQzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUwODYwOTcwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjA5MzQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Naval veteran arrives home from war unsettled and uncertain of his future - until he is tantalized by The Cause and its charismatic leader."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000450/","name":"Philip Seymour Hoffman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001618/","name":"Joaquin Phoenix"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0010736/","name":"Amy Adams"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000759/","name":"Paul Thomas Anderson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0150452/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0027686/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323215/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000759/","name":"Paul Thomas Anderson"}],"duration":"PT2H18M"}</script><metacontent="

It really is simply, just like man, a fascinating piece of work.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":165293,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-09-21","keywords":"scientology,past life regression,psychological testing,cult,mentor protege relationship","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1378657561","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUwODYwOTcwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjA5MzQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUwODYwOTcwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjA5MzQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Naval veteran arrives home from war unsettled and uncertain of his future - until he is tantalized by The Cause and its charismatic leader.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000450/","name":"Philip Seymour Hoffman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001618/","name":"Joaquin Phoenix","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0010736/","name":"Amy Adams"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000759/","name":"Paul Thomas Anderson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0150452/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0027686/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323215/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000759/","name":"Paul Thomas Anderson"],"duration":"PT2H18M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Life of David Gale
Život Davida Galea
programme.desc:
The Life of David Gale: Directed by Alan Parker. With Kate Winslet, Cleo King, Constance Jones, Kevin Spacey. A man against capital punishment is accused of murdering a fellow activist and is sent to death row." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0289992/","name":"The Life of David Gale","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxMzU0NTgxNzZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU2MDQzNDkxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man against capital punishment is accused of murdering a fellow activist and is sent to death row.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0289992/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Li-1"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Seen as a thriller, it's very engaging, almost ruined by a gratuitously unneccessary final shot.","reviewBody":"** 1/2 out of ****

The Life of David Gale was slammed by critics for being a sanctimonious preachfest. I prefer to view the movie as a mystery/thriller with the death penalty views as a background for its plot. Seen as thus, this is a mostly satisfying thriller, packed with just the right amount of twists and turns, red herrings, and intriguing characters to entertain for its two-hour running time.

Kate Winslet (look prettier than ever) star as Bitsey Bloom, a journalist who is on task to interview David Gale (Kevin Spacey) before he is to be executed in three days. He was a former professor sentenced for the rape and murder of Constance Harraway (Laura Linney), who along with Gale, were close friends and advocates against the death penalty. As Gale unfolds the tale of the last few months of his life before the murder, she slowly begins to believe he might actually be innocent and that the real killer could be very well out there, watching her every move.

As I said before, The Life of David Gale is a very entertaining thriller. Seen as just that, a thriller, it does have its flaws, some of it pertaining to Winslet. Her performance is actually quite good, it's that, as is the case with a lot of movies in this genre, the "detectives" are usually the least well-developed characters, simply because they're there to gather the facts and piece the clues together. The only things we know about her is that she's determined and very tenacious. 

Both Spacey and Linney are excellent, convincing in their portrayals of normal individuals who suffer plenty of heartbreak in their lives, with the latter eventually losing hers in a brutal manner. Spacey, during the interview scenes, exudes an aura of mystery and quiet uneasiness, basically the same style of acting he's relied on almost his entire career. Still, he's good at it, but one wonders when he'll really break out into something completely different.

The film runs smoothly for most of its running time, and the movie's first big twist, revealed with about a half-hour left, caught me off-guard, in a good way. It's the final scene that irks me. That last shot should have been omitted from the film, as it negates the purpose of much of what went on the previous two hours and might even make you lose complete respect for one of its major characters. Director Alan Parker obviously meant for this shot to chill us, and while it will probably to that effect initially, you're going to feel cheated once the credits have rolled."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":117036,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2003-02-21","keywords":"wrongful conviction,sex with student,video footage,texas death row,murder","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Life of David Gale","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1617998873","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODVjZGM4NGEtY2IyMi00MWI4LWE5MGItZTZlMDhmOTg4NWNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODVjZGM4NGEtY2IyMi00MWI4LWE5MGItZTZlMDhmOTg4NWNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000228/","name":"Kevin Spacey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001473/","name":"Laura Linney"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000570/","name":"Alan Parker"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010183/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0502036/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1017488/","name":"Charles Randolph"}],"duration":"PT2H10M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
Srednja škola: Najgore razdoblje mog života
programme.desc:
Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life: Directed by Steve Carr. With Griffin Gluck, Lauren Graham, Alexa Nisenson, Andrew Daly. After his principal (Andy Daly) destroys his sketchbook, Rafe (Griffin Gluck) and his best friend Leo (Thomas Barbusca) decide to "destroy his book" and break every rule in the school's Code of Conduct." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4981636/","name":"Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjQzMTczNjI0Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODY5MTY5OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After his principal (Andy Daly) destroys his sketchbook, Rafe (Griffin Gluck) and his best friend Leo (Thomas Barbusca) decide to "destroy his book" and break every rule in the school's Code of Conduct.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4981636/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"goolizap"},"dateCreated":"2016-11-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Twizard Rating: 89","reviewBody":"As I've said a thousand times before, the lack of live-action comedies for the younger members of our society saddens me. In the '90s, when I grew up, you couldn't get away from them. It was awesome. But nowadays, pre-teens' only options for movies are of the superhero variety. Or some other big budget franchise. Unless they merely want to watch animated films with characters that aren't human. And I'm not knocking computer animation. It's just that during a time when empathy is getting further and further away, it's nice for kids to see "tangible" characters that they can actually relate to.

And there have been some good live-action options for kids semi-lately. The Diary of a Wimpy Kid series, for example, was perfect. But many others dumb themselves down for children. And when this happens, you lose the parents as well.

Middle School isn't like that. It's full of quality humor and an engaging storyline that will find both kids and adults laughing out loud--the latter might even be surprised with how much they like it.

The film follows Rafe (Griffin Gluck), a middle schooler who's been inexplicably kicked out of his previous two schools. His active imagination, along with problems with authority, get him into trouble. Especially at his new school, where the principal (Andrew Daly) acts as a warden, creating asinine rules. The kids aren't allowed to talk in the hallways, wear colorful clothes, or even draw pictures.

Rafe isn't having any of this nonsense and wages a war with his principal in a Home Alone-type of way. It's highly entertaining seeing what he comes up with and how his life progresses with those around him, including his best friend, Leo (Thomas Barbusca), his sister Georgia (Alexa Nisenson), and his cool insouciant teacher, Mr. Teller (Adam Pally).

And with the quality talents of Rob Riggle, who plays Rafe's borderline-abusive future stepfather, and Daly, Middle School has humor for young and old.

Yeah, the script has some issues with a couple of jarring tonal shifts, but it also refreshingly surprises us when we least expect it.

I have a hard time knocking a film that does its job. It never talks down to kids--in fact, it gets kids all too well. There isn't some over-exaggeration of how much they use their phones. Even the banter feels lifelike. It speaks to adolescents who are at that "middle" stage between childhood and responsibility-hood. It's a fun time that most of us took for granted. But Middle School pleasantly brings us back so we can live it over again with Rafe--in a stunningly committed first-person narrative.

This film isn't just going through the motions, folks. There's a lot of genuine intent throughout. Plot points and jokes that are obviously very well meditated upon. While sitting and watching this movie, I legitimately thought to myself, "This isn't just a moneymaker for them--they actually want it to be good." Even if it were among the other classic live-action kid films of yesteryear, I would still go out of my way to watch it. I wish I had this movie when I was growing up. But at least I have it now.

Twizard Rating: 89","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8617,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2016-10-07","keywords":"mother son relationship,brother sister relationship,slimehouse,middle school,teenager","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Read Along Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2163783449","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzMjMxMjY1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzYwNDczOTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzMjMxMjY1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzYwNDczOTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A quiet teenage artist Rafe Katchadorian has a wild imagination and is sick of middle school and the rules that have been put before him. Rafe and his best friend Leo have come up with a plan: break every rule in the school hand book and as you expect trouble follows."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3838034/","name":"Griffin Gluck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0334179/","name":"Lauren Graham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6835961/","name":"Alexa Nisenson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139867/","name":"Steve Carr"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047306/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0258914/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0132772/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0101302/","name":"Chris Bowman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1376062/","name":"Hubbel Palmer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1289517/","name":"Kara Holden"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

But Middle School pleasantly brings us back so we can live it over again with Rafe--in a stunningly committed first-person narrative.

This film isn't just going through the motions, folks. There's a lot of genuine intent throughout. Plot points and jokes that are obviously very well meditated upon. While sitting and watching this movie, I legitimately thought to myself, "This isn't just a moneymaker for them--they actually want it to be good." Even if it were among the other classic live-action kid films of yesteryear, I would still go out of my way to watch it. I wish I had this movie when I was growing up. But at least I have it now.

programme.title: Un moment d'égarement
Trenutak ludila
programme.desc:
Un moment d'égarement: Directed by Jean-François Richet. With Vincent Cassel, François Cluzet, Lola Le Lann, Alice Isaaz. Two friends bring their daughters with them on a beach vacation and find themselves in an awkward situation. A remake of the 1977 film "Un moment d'égarement"." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2191765/","name":"Un moment d'égarement","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGQ4ODY1M2YtMzA3YS00NTM0LTg1NTctYTJlMDg5ZWNhOWJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two friends bring their daughters with them on a beach vacation and find themselves in an awkward situation. A remake of the 1977 film "Un moment d'égarement".","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2191765/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fil-nik09"},"dateCreated":"2016-04-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Quite good!","reviewBody":"French movies are either so boring and dull or totally opposite: really awesome. This one is really great and kinda feel good movie ( at least for me).

What I liked about the movie... I liked the landscapes and whole background. Really nice nature of the Corsica ( though I believe it was filmed somewhere in the south of France) and colors of the summer. The soundtrack to the movie was surprisingly new - Lean On, Diamonds by Rihanna and many recent hits. The girls are really believable ( well, I guess all they had to do is to be themselves) and Vincent. The other dad was over dramatic and I had a feeling he was trying too hard to act those angry and awkward situations that he becomes cartoonishly silly. 

I did not know that the movie is a remake of the 70's movie... I might look for it. The whole summertime feel and carelessness feel remind me of another French movie: The Pool.

All in all, the movie is really watchable and enjoyable. It ends with a girl smiling...and I couldn't help but smile too.
