programme.title: Desperate Housewives
Kućanice
programme.desc: Desperate Housewives: Created by Marc Cherry. With Teri Hatcher, Felicity Huffman, Marcia Cross, Eva Longoria. Secrets and truths unfold through the lives of female friends in one suburban neighborhood, after the mysterious suicide of a neighbor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0410975/","name":"Desperate Housewives","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzI2MTFjZDktYTZhNS00YTU2LWI5ZTMtM2MzNDU1YjNhNTJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Secrets and truths unfold through the lives of female friends in one suburban neighborhood, after the mysterious suicide of a neighbor.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0410975/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TruPretender"},"dateCreated":"2005-02-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Look east, look west, look up and down! Its Susan, Bree, Lynette, Gabrielle, and Edie!","reviewBody":"Here it is! The best show to hit the prime time dial in years! Teri Hatcher, Marcia Cross, Felicity Huffman, Nicolette Sheridan, and James Denton create the most bizarre and un believably satirical world of Wisteria Lane, a beautiful neighborhood with beautiful woman, each lives the perfect life...on the outside! Matching "American Beauty" with "Melrose Place", this fresh, raunchy, and intelligent show revolves around four women who begin uncovering a series of mysteries when their best friend commits suicide. Susan Mayer(Teri Hatcher) is a Striking, chirpy woman with a beautiful daughter and a great romance with Mike Delfino(James Denton), but her flaw of natural klutziness gets her in trouble. Hatcher is irresistibly funny, and brings hysterics to the screen. Bree Van De Camp(Marcia Cross) is the stereotypical "Stepford" wife who brings jealousy to the most sweetest of ladies with her perfect life, blue flowers, smart kids, and exceptional marriage...RIGHT! Her life consists of struggling to retain her marriage, or lack there of. Her children hate her most of the time, and her husband can't stand her perfection. Cross is remarkably powerful in performance, and displays witty charm, and howlingly hilarious reactions to the events surrounding her. Not to mention being gorgeous beyond belief! Lynette Scavo(Felicity Huffman) gets the most sympathy from us as the successful woman, on her way to becoming the most powerful woman in business, and then pregnancy after pregnancy takes it all away. Now, she struggles with the most out-of-control children in television history, and a husband who just doesn't get it, or any thing else! Huffman is exceptional in this role, and deserves the recognition for her efforts. She gains so much sympathy when she breaks on children's medication, Lynette is one most people would love to sit and "bitch" with, I know I would. Next is Gabrielle Solis(Eva Longoria), the perfect woman, the rich marriage the most dreaming life of the block...AS IF! She sleeps with teens, and worms her way in and out of situations both good and bad, but she has her funny moments. Longoria is predictably slutty temptress, with minor qualities to redeem, so far. With a little learning for Gabrielle, we might see more than pretty faces with Mrs. Solis, but Longoria is alright. Last, but NEVER least, is Edie Britt(Nicolette Sheridan), a man-hungry woman with a wip and handcuffs! She will walk all over you to get to your man! Watch out for Edie! Sheridan is just right for this caustic, little sexy villainess of the street. Yes, all the women shine in their glory of the show! Better than anything else on TV right now, and probably in the future, "Desperate Housewives" will satisfy to the very touch of perfection, and beyond! Marc Cherry has created a masterpiece with this one! Thank the almighty for this one coming to the TV screen! May we be blessed with this show for many, many years to come!!!!! A perfect 10/10, 100% brilliant!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":122814,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2004-10-03","keywords":"conflict of interest,female protagonist,domestic drama,suspense mystery,friend","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000159/","name":"Teri Hatcher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005031/","name":"Felicity Huffman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0189220/","name":"Marcia Cross"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0165580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028589/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0156100/","name":"Marc Cherry"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Desperate Housewives: The Complete Sixth Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1644955417","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGIwMGUzMWUtZDRkNi00ZDVjLWE1MjMtMTZhYjUyMWFiNWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGIwMGUzMWUtZDRkNi00ZDVjLWE1MjMtMTZhYjUyMWFiNWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"TT #1"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Desperate Housewives
Kućanice
programme.desc: Desperate Housewives: Created by Marc Cherry. With Teri Hatcher, Felicity Huffman, Marcia Cross, Eva Longoria. Secrets and truths unfold through the lives of female friends in one suburban neighborhood, after the mysterious suicide of a neighbor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0410975/","name":"Desperate Housewives","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzI2MTFjZDktYTZhNS00YTU2LWI5ZTMtM2MzNDU1YjNhNTJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Secrets and truths unfold through the lives of female friends in one suburban neighborhood, after the mysterious suicide of a neighbor.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0410975/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TruPretender"},"dateCreated":"2005-02-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Look east, look west, look up and down! Its Susan, Bree, Lynette, Gabrielle, and Edie!","reviewBody":"Here it is! The best show to hit the prime time dial in years! Teri Hatcher, Marcia Cross, Felicity Huffman, Nicolette Sheridan, and James Denton create the most bizarre and un believably satirical world of Wisteria Lane, a beautiful neighborhood with beautiful woman, each lives the perfect life...on the outside! Matching "American Beauty" with "Melrose Place", this fresh, raunchy, and intelligent show revolves around four women who begin uncovering a series of mysteries when their best friend commits suicide. Susan Mayer(Teri Hatcher) is a Striking, chirpy woman with a beautiful daughter and a great romance with Mike Delfino(James Denton), but her flaw of natural klutziness gets her in trouble. Hatcher is irresistibly funny, and brings hysterics to the screen. Bree Van De Camp(Marcia Cross) is the stereotypical "Stepford" wife who brings jealousy to the most sweetest of ladies with her perfect life, blue flowers, smart kids, and exceptional marriage...RIGHT! Her life consists of struggling to retain her marriage, or lack there of. Her children hate her most of the time, and her husband can't stand her perfection. Cross is remarkably powerful in performance, and displays witty charm, and howlingly hilarious reactions to the events surrounding her. Not to mention being gorgeous beyond belief! Lynette Scavo(Felicity Huffman) gets the most sympathy from us as the successful woman, on her way to becoming the most powerful woman in business, and then pregnancy after pregnancy takes it all away. Now, she struggles with the most out-of-control children in television history, and a husband who just doesn't get it, or any thing else! Huffman is exceptional in this role, and deserves the recognition for her efforts. She gains so much sympathy when she breaks on children's medication, Lynette is one most people would love to sit and "bitch" with, I know I would. Next is Gabrielle Solis(Eva Longoria), the perfect woman, the rich marriage the most dreaming life of the block...AS IF! She sleeps with teens, and worms her way in and out of situations both good and bad, but she has her funny moments. Longoria is predictably slutty temptress, with minor qualities to redeem, so far. With a little learning for Gabrielle, we might see more than pretty faces with Mrs. Solis, but Longoria is alright. Last, but NEVER least, is Edie Britt(Nicolette Sheridan), a man-hungry woman with a wip and handcuffs! She will walk all over you to get to your man! Watch out for Edie! Sheridan is just right for this caustic, little sexy villainess of the street. Yes, all the women shine in their glory of the show! Better than anything else on TV right now, and probably in the future, "Desperate Housewives" will satisfy to the very touch of perfection, and beyond! Marc Cherry has created a masterpiece with this one! Thank the almighty for this one coming to the TV screen! May we be blessed with this show for many, many years to come!!!!! A perfect 10/10, 100% brilliant!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":122814,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2004-10-03","keywords":"conflict of interest,female protagonist,domestic drama,suspense mystery,friend","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000159/","name":"Teri Hatcher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005031/","name":"Felicity Huffman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0189220/","name":"Marcia Cross"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0165580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028589/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0156100/","name":"Marc Cherry"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Desperate Housewives: The Complete Sixth Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1644955417","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGIwMGUzMWUtZDRkNi00ZDVjLWE1MjMtMTZhYjUyMWFiNWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGIwMGUzMWUtZDRkNi00ZDVjLWE1MjMtMTZhYjUyMWFiNWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"TT #1"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Meet the Parents
Dozvola za brak
programme.desc: Meet the Parents: Directed by Jay Roach. With Robert De Niro, Ben Stiller, Teri Polo, Blythe Danner. Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0212338/","name":"Meet the Parents","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGNlMGZiMmUtZjU0NC00MWU4LWI0YTgtYzdlNGVhZGU4NWZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0212338/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"deloudelouvain"},"dateCreated":"2016-01-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Love it! Can watch it over and over again.","reviewBody":"Haha this is one of those comedies that you will always remember. Full of classic lines that my wife and I constantly use on daily bases, like "if it has teat then you can milk it, puff the magical dragon, the circle of trust and so on..." Meet The Parents is full of those phrases that makes me laugh every time I think about it. And that's what defines a good comedy to me. If I watch a comedy I want to laugh and with this one it's what you get. Some people might not like it but then to me they just don't have a sense of humor and that's just a pity for them. You have to like Ben Stiller though because it's basically him that is the great comedian of the movie. If you don't like him you probably not going to like the movie either. Like I don't like the movies with Adam Sandler. I think that guy is not funny and so his comedies are painful to watch for me. In Meet The Parents the whole story is basically about the relation between Ben Stiller and Robert De Niro. Robert De Niro that plays his role brilliantly as well by the way. The other actors are good as well but it's not them that carry the movie. To me it's already a classic movie when I think about the best comedies I ever saw.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":322710,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2001-01-17","keywords":"trailer narrated by hal douglas,male nurse,nurse,cat,wedding","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi877640473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwODYwODEtNDdiOS00NGY5LThkZjAtMWFkNzY4ZTdlZTViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwODYwODEtNDdiOS00NGY5LThkZjAtMWFkNzY4ZTdlZTViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001774/","name":"Ben Stiller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000134/","name":"Robert De Niro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001632/","name":"Teri Polo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005366/","name":"Jay Roach"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012648/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0322839/","name":"Greg Glienna"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0164898/","name":"Mary Ruth Clarke"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0381272/","name":"Jim Herzfeld"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mamica
programme.desc: Tek otriježnjena samohrana majka pokušava ispraviti svoj život u dolini Napa, dok se mora nositi sa svojom nesavjesnom majkom. Anna Faris i dobitnica nagrade Emmy, Allison Janney, glume u novoj komediji Chucka Lorrea - satiričan pogled na pravu obiteljsku ljubav i disfunkcionalnost. Odnedavno trijezna samohrana majka, muči se odgojiti dvoje djece u svijetu punom iskušenja.

programme.title: Mamica
programme.desc: Tek otriježnjena samohrana majka pokušava ispraviti svoj život u dolini Napa, dok se mora nositi sa svojom nesavjesnom majkom. Anna Faris i dobitnica nagrade Emmy, Allison Janney, glume u novoj komediji Chucka Lorrea - satiričan pogled na pravu obiteljsku ljubav i disfunkcionalnost. Odnedavno trijezna samohrana majka, muči se odgojiti dvoje djece u svijetu punom iskušenja.

programme.title: Desperate Housewives
Kućanice
programme.desc: Desperate Housewives: Created by Marc Cherry. With Teri Hatcher, Felicity Huffman, Marcia Cross, Eva Longoria. Secrets and truths unfold through the lives of female friends in one suburban neighborhood, after the mysterious suicide of a neighbor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0410975/","name":"Desperate Housewives","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzI2MTFjZDktYTZhNS00YTU2LWI5ZTMtM2MzNDU1YjNhNTJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Secrets and truths unfold through the lives of female friends in one suburban neighborhood, after the mysterious suicide of a neighbor.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0410975/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TruPretender"},"dateCreated":"2005-02-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Look east, look west, look up and down! Its Susan, Bree, Lynette, Gabrielle, and Edie!","reviewBody":"Here it is! The best show to hit the prime time dial in years! Teri Hatcher, Marcia Cross, Felicity Huffman, Nicolette Sheridan, and James Denton create the most bizarre and un believably satirical world of Wisteria Lane, a beautiful neighborhood with beautiful woman, each lives the perfect life...on the outside! Matching "American Beauty" with "Melrose Place", this fresh, raunchy, and intelligent show revolves around four women who begin uncovering a series of mysteries when their best friend commits suicide. Susan Mayer(Teri Hatcher) is a Striking, chirpy woman with a beautiful daughter and a great romance with Mike Delfino(James Denton), but her flaw of natural klutziness gets her in trouble. Hatcher is irresistibly funny, and brings hysterics to the screen. Bree Van De Camp(Marcia Cross) is the stereotypical "Stepford" wife who brings jealousy to the most sweetest of ladies with her perfect life, blue flowers, smart kids, and exceptional marriage...RIGHT! Her life consists of struggling to retain her marriage, or lack there of. Her children hate her most of the time, and her husband can't stand her perfection. Cross is remarkably powerful in performance, and displays witty charm, and howlingly hilarious reactions to the events surrounding her. Not to mention being gorgeous beyond belief! Lynette Scavo(Felicity Huffman) gets the most sympathy from us as the successful woman, on her way to becoming the most powerful woman in business, and then pregnancy after pregnancy takes it all away. Now, she struggles with the most out-of-control children in television history, and a husband who just doesn't get it, or any thing else! Huffman is exceptional in this role, and deserves the recognition for her efforts. She gains so much sympathy when she breaks on children's medication, Lynette is one most people would love to sit and "bitch" with, I know I would. Next is Gabrielle Solis(Eva Longoria), the perfect woman, the rich marriage the most dreaming life of the block...AS IF! She sleeps with teens, and worms her way in and out of situations both good and bad, but she has her funny moments. Longoria is predictably slutty temptress, with minor qualities to redeem, so far. With a little learning for Gabrielle, we might see more than pretty faces with Mrs. Solis, but Longoria is alright. Last, but NEVER least, is Edie Britt(Nicolette Sheridan), a man-hungry woman with a wip and handcuffs! She will walk all over you to get to your man! Watch out for Edie! Sheridan is just right for this caustic, little sexy villainess of the street. Yes, all the women shine in their glory of the show! Better than anything else on TV right now, and probably in the future, "Desperate Housewives" will satisfy to the very touch of perfection, and beyond! Marc Cherry has created a masterpiece with this one! Thank the almighty for this one coming to the TV screen! May we be blessed with this show for many, many years to come!!!!! A perfect 10/10, 100% brilliant!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":122814,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2004-10-03","keywords":"conflict of interest,female protagonist,domestic drama,suspense mystery,friend","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000159/","name":"Teri Hatcher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005031/","name":"Felicity Huffman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0189220/","name":"Marcia Cross"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0165580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028589/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0156100/","name":"Marc Cherry"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Desperate Housewives: The Complete Sixth Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1644955417","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGIwMGUzMWUtZDRkNi00ZDVjLWE1MjMtMTZhYjUyMWFiNWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGIwMGUzMWUtZDRkNi00ZDVjLWE1MjMtMTZhYjUyMWFiNWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"TT #1"}}</script><metacontent="

credits.actor: Teri Hatcher, Felicity Huffman, Marcia Cross, Eva Longoria, Nicollette Sheridan, Ricardo Chavira, Andrea Bowen, Doug Savant

programme.review: --- Actors: Teri Hatcher (role=Susan Mayer), Felicity Huffman (role=Lynette Scavo), Marcia Cross (role=Bree Van De Kamp), Eva Longoria (role=Gabrielle Solis), Ricardo Chavira (role=Carlos Solis), Brenda Strong (role=Mary Alice Young), James Denton (role=Mike Delfino), Doug Savant (role=Tom Scavo), Shawn Pyfrom (role=Andrew Van De Kamp), Nicollette Sheridan (role=Edie Britt), Andrea Bowen (role=Julie Mayer), Kyle MacLachlan (role=Orson Hodge)

Secrets and truths unfold through the lives of female friends in one suburban neighborhood, after the mysterious suicide of a neighbor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0410975/","name":"Desperate Housewives","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzI2MTFjZDktYTZhNS00YTU2LWI5ZTMtM2MzNDU1YjNhNTJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Secrets and truths unfold through the lives of female friends in one suburban neighborhood, after the mysterious suicide of a neighbor.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0410975/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TruPretender"},"dateCreated":"2005-02-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Look east, look west, look up and down! Its Susan, Bree, Lynette, Gabrielle, and Edie!","reviewBody":"Here it is! The best show to hit the prime time dial in years! Teri Hatcher, Marcia Cross, Felicity Huffman, Nicolette Sheridan, and James Denton create the most bizarre and un believably satirical world of Wisteria Lane, a beautiful neighborhood with beautiful woman, each lives the perfect life...on the outside! Matching "American Beauty" with "Melrose Place", this fresh, raunchy, and intelligent show revolves around four women who begin uncovering a series of mysteries when their best friend commits suicide. Susan Mayer(Teri Hatcher) is a Striking, chirpy woman with a beautiful daughter and a great romance with Mike Delfino(James Denton), but her flaw of natural klutziness gets her in trouble. Hatcher is irresistibly funny, and brings hysterics to the screen. Bree Van De Camp(Marcia Cross) is the stereotypical "Stepford" wife who brings jealousy to the most sweetest of ladies with her perfect life, blue flowers, smart kids, and exceptional marriage...RIGHT! Her life consists of struggling to retain her marriage, or lack there of. Her children hate her most of the time, and her husband can't stand her perfection. Cross is remarkably powerful in performance, and displays witty charm, and howlingly hilarious reactions to the events surrounding her. Not to mention being gorgeous beyond belief! Lynette Scavo(Felicity Huffman) gets the most sympathy from us as the successful woman, on her way to becoming the most powerful woman in business, and then pregnancy after pregnancy takes it all away. Now, she struggles with the most out-of-control children in television history, and a husband who just doesn't get it, or any thing else! Huffman is exceptional in this role, and deserves the recognition for her efforts. She gains so much sympathy when she breaks on children's medication, Lynette is one most people would love to sit and "bitch" with, I know I would. Next is Gabrielle Solis(Eva Longoria), the perfect woman, the rich marriage the most dreaming life of the block...AS IF! She sleeps with teens, and worms her way in and out of situations both good and bad, but she has her funny moments. Longoria is predictably slutty temptress, with minor qualities to redeem, so far. With a little learning for Gabrielle, we might see more than pretty faces with Mrs. Solis, but Longoria is alright. Last, but NEVER least, is Edie Britt(Nicolette Sheridan), a man-hungry woman with a wip and handcuffs! She will walk all over you to get to your man! Watch out for Edie! Sheridan is just right for this caustic, little sexy villainess of the street. Yes, all the women shine in their glory of the show! Better than anything else on TV right now, and probably in the future, "Desperate Housewives" will satisfy to the very touch of perfection, and beyond! Marc Cherry has created a masterpiece with this one! Thank the almighty for this one coming to the TV screen! May we be blessed with this show for many, many years to come!!!!! A perfect 10/10, 100% brilliant!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":122814,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2004-10-03","keywords":"conflict of interest,female protagonist,domestic drama,suspense mystery,friend","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000159/","name":"Teri Hatcher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005031/","name":"Felicity Huffman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0189220/","name":"Marcia Cross"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0165580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028589/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0156100/","name":"Marc Cherry"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Desperate Housewives: The Complete Sixth Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1644955417","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGIwMGUzMWUtZDRkNi00ZDVjLWE1MjMtMTZhYjUyMWFiNWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGIwMGUzMWUtZDRkNi00ZDVjLWE1MjMtMTZhYjUyMWFiNWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"TT #1"}}</script><metacontent="

Ostavljeni
programme.desc: The Leftovers: Created by Damon Lindelof, Tom Perrotta. With Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston, Chris Zylka. Three years after the disappearance of two percent of the global population, a group of people in a small New York community try to continue their lives while coping with the tragedy of the unexplained nature of the event." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2699128/","name":"The Leftovers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTE3MDc1MjY4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDg4MjQ4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three years after the disappearance of two percent of the global population, a group of people in a small New York community try to continue their lives while coping with the tragedy of the unexplained nature of the event.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2699128/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gorman2462"},"dateCreated":"2014-07-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Don't let these naysayers persuade you","reviewBody":"I guess everyone on this site is an academy award winner. The writing is not terrible, and the story line is not cliché'd. There is a ton of potential with this series and I am excited to see what comes next. The characters are compelling, there is a lot of mystery surrounding what has happened and what is happening in the future. Weird groups start to form and prophets arise as people are seeking answers as to why 140 million people just disappear. \n\nAs for all the trolls bashing this series, I'd imagine they would say Boardwalk Empire and Breaking Bad are cliché'd as well. I felt compelled to defend this series and that's the only reason I am writing this review. Watch it, judge for yourself, not by what some self righteous wanna be writer has to say about it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":89628,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2014-06-29","keywords":"dog,disappearance,reference to the rapture,rapture,small town","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0857620/","name":"Justin Theroux"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000312/","name":"Amy Brenneman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001172/","name":"Christopher Eccleston"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152188/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005035/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0511541/","name":"Damon Lindelof"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0674909/","name":"Tom Perrotta"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final Season Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi962180633","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjlhZjNmYjUtYWViZS00NWUwLWFhZWMtODUyMjcyNTRjMzcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjlhZjNmYjUtYWViZS00NWUwLWFhZWMtODUyMjcyNTRjMzcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the Final Season Trailer for "The Leftovers.""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Battle: Los Angeles: Directed by Jonathan Liebesman. With Aaron Eckhart, Ramon Rodriguez, Will Rothhaar, Cory Hardrict. A squad of U.S. Marines becomes the last line of defense against a global invasion." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1217613/","name":"Battle: Los Angeles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDg2NzQwOGMtMGRkNC00YjAwLTg4NjgtZWQwYzljZmM1YzA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A squad of U.S. Marines becomes the last line of defense against a global invasion.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1217613/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sstallion"},"dateCreated":"2011-03-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Finally ... What I wanted to see after I watched the trailer for Skyline !!!!","reviewBody":"I went into this movie with low expectations after the relative disappointment which was skyline, a film that promised so much from the trailer and delivered far less.

However, im glad to say any misgivings I had were quickly expelled. Now don't get me wrong, this isn't the greatest film ever made, and in many ways it fails to hold a candle to the likes of independence day, which in my opinion is one of the greatest films of its type ever made. It does however, bring a much more up close and personal aspect to an alien invasion. Its more like watching a war filmed in Iraq or something, but that in itself is what separates it from a muddle of recent alien invasion movies that fails to ignite any kind of fire in the mind.

The film moves at an unrelenting pace, with good action sequences and cgi to boot, its predictable at times and the ending fails to come up with something clever or original, but hey ... you cant have everything !!!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177737,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-03-11","keywords":"invasion,alien invasion,extraterrestrial,male lieutenant,wounded man","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Battle: Los Angeles - Nothing Can Prepare You","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3897661977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5Nzc5MzQxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTk5MDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5Nzc5MzQxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTk5MDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch an exclusive trailer for the new film Battle: Los Angeles."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001173/","name":"Aaron Eckhart"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0509448/","name":"Jonathan Liebesman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0078203/","name":"Christopher Bertolini"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: The Tuxedo: Directed by Kevin Donovan. With Jackie Chan, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Jason Isaacs, Debi Mazar. A hapless chauffeur must take a comatose Secret Agent's place using his special gadget-laden tuxedo." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0290095/","name":"The Tuxedo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEyNTI0NjM5M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMjQ0NTE3._V1_.jpg","description":"A hapless chauffeur must take a comatose Secret Agent's place using his special gadget-laden tuxedo.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0290095/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TDE156"},"dateCreated":"2003-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"stupid idea, stupid movie","reviewBody":"I think Jackie Chan movies are cool. They have great action with humor, and normally a good plot. This movie is a disappointment. It didn't have enough action, badly scripted humor, and the plot is beyond stupid.The concept of Jackie Chan being a tuxedo-clad super hero is silly and wierd. The idea of the villain poisoning the town's water supply with water striders is lame. Also, if I have to listen to Jackie Chan's rude partner(Jinnifer Love Hewett) complain,I'm going to scream.She was very pretty, but not likeable at all.When I was watching this movie, I felt like Jackie falling off that water tower. Very painful to watch.\n\nhalf a star out of five"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":82342,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Comedy","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2003-01-08","keywords":"boxer shorts,slimehouse,molecule,tuxedo,chauffeur","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000329/","name":"Jackie Chan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001349/","name":"Jennifer Love Hewitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005042/","name":"Jason Isaacs"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1019493/","name":"Kevin Donovan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0072233/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108321/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006534/","name":"Phil Hay"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0542062/","name":"Matt Manfredi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5022110/","name":"Michael J. programme.title: Resident Evil: Retribution
Resident Evil: Osveta
programme.desc: Resident Evil: Retribution: Directed by Paul W.S. Anderson. With Milla Jovovich, Sienna Guillory, Michelle Rodriguez, Aryana Engineer. Alice fights alongside a resistance movement to regain her freedom from an Umbrella Corporation testing facility." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1855325/","name":"Resident Evil: Retribution","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY0NjcwMWMtN2MyNC00ZmZjLWEwZTAtM2ExYWE1NDUwNWQyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Alice fights alongside a resistance movement to regain her freedom from an Umbrella Corporation testing facility.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1855325/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chanakya-dwivedi"},"dateCreated":"2012-09-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"It is not even close to what you will be expecting!!","reviewBody":"I was eagerly looking forward to the 5th installment of this series and I am sorry to say that I have been really let down! Apart from the once in a while visuals, the movie has not been able to get even close to expectations. The first 10 minutes of the movie and you will start feeling disconnected from the movie already not caring at all what is gonna happen in the next scene. After resident evil 3 & 4, I was expecting a lot out of this installment and from Paul W.S. Anderson but he has not been able to live up the mark at all. The action scenes rather than being nail-biting, turned out to be hilarious and funny. There isn't a single moment in the movie where you are actually glued to screen. Milla Jovovich looks pretty as always, but that won't save the movie. All others have done a horrible job with their acting, especially Sienna Guillory. I would say that the only reason you would want to watch this movie is if you are a fan of the resident evil series and you don't mind wasting your money and time for the sake of this series.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":138144,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2012-09-14","keywords":"zombie,umbrella,corporation,rescue,fight","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3931415065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxMDk3MDA0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjM5MzQ5Nw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxMDk3MDA0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjM5MzQ5Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Alice fights alongside a resistance movement in the continuing battle against the Umbrella Corporation and the undead.\r\n"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000170/","name":"Milla Jovovich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0347149/","name":"Sienna Guillory"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0027271/","name":"Paul W.S. programme.desc:
Battle: Los Angeles: Directed by Jonathan Liebesman. With Aaron Eckhart, Ramon Rodriguez, Will Rothhaar, Cory Hardrict. A squad of U.S. Marines becomes the last line of defense against a global invasion." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1217613/","name":"Battle: Los Angeles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDg2NzQwOGMtMGRkNC00YjAwLTg4NjgtZWQwYzljZmM1YzA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A squad of U.S. Marines becomes the last line of defense against a global invasion.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1217613/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sstallion"},"dateCreated":"2011-03-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Finally ... What I wanted to see after I watched the trailer for Skyline !!!!","reviewBody":"I went into this movie with low expectations after the relative disappointment which was skyline, a film that promised so much from the trailer and delivered far less.

However, im glad to say any misgivings I had were quickly expelled. Now don't get me wrong, this isn't the greatest film ever made, and in many ways it fails to hold a candle to the likes of independence day, which in my opinion is one of the greatest films of its type ever made. It does however, bring a much more up close and personal aspect to an alien invasion. Its more like watching a war filmed in Iraq or something, but that in itself is what separates it from a muddle of recent alien invasion movies that fails to ignite any kind of fire in the mind.

The film moves at an unrelenting pace, with good action sequences and cgi to boot, its predictable at times and the ending fails to come up with something clever or original, but hey ... you cant have everything !!!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177737,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-03-11","keywords":"invasion,alien invasion,extraterrestrial,male lieutenant,wounded man","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Battle: Los Angeles - Nothing Can Prepare You","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3897661977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5Nzc5MzQxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTk5MDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5Nzc5MzQxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTk5MDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch an exclusive trailer for the new film Battle: Los Angeles."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001173/","name":"Aaron Eckhart"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0509448/","name":"Jonathan Liebesman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0078203/","name":"Christopher Bertolini"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Madagascar
Madagaskar
programme.desc:
Madagascar: Directed by Eric Darnell, Tom McGrath. With Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer, Jada Pinkett Smith. A group of animals who have spent all their life in a New York zoo end up in the jungles of Madagascar, and must adjust to living in the wild." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0351283/","name":"Madagascar","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2I5YzFlYWEtZjRhNy00ZmQzLWJhNTktZGIwYjFjODdmNDgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of animals who have spent all their life in a New York zoo end up in the jungles of Madagascar, and must adjust to living in the wild.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0351283/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"BraveHawk"},"dateCreated":"2005-06-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"I've Seen Better And Worse. Overall, It Is A Decent Kids Movie That Can Hold Adults Attention As Well.","reviewBody":"Let's face it, it's hard to put out a good animation movie that is equal to Shrek, The Incredibles or Finding Nemo. Those are hard movies to follow but Madagascar is by no means a bad movie. In fact, I will still rate this pretty high, as I enjoyed it without watching the clock.

The plot was very easy for children to follow while not so simplistic that adults become bored in the middle. The simple plot was that 4 animals raised in a zoo venture out into the wild and quickly realize how easy they had it back home in the New York Zoo.

There was quite a few humorous scenes in Madagascar, but my favorite has to be the "distinguished" chimps who get offended that the thought of looking or smelling like a monkey is bad. An honorable mention is the penguins who also got more than they bargained for in Antarctica.

While some of the graphics are sub-par to other movies I've mentioned, like Alex the Lion (voiced by Ben Stiller) for instance. At times they look sort of like clay-mation or something, and other they look positively life-like. The scenery and the lemurs stand out as the most beautifully rendered parts of the movie.

This movie is great for getting the kids out of the house and not too bad if the normal adult wants to get away and enjoy something more suitable for the family as well."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":384163,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2005-07-27","keywords":"zoo,dolphin,talking animal,first part,cgi animation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Madagascar","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1602270745","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNTQyOTA2N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTQ2MzkxMDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNTQyOTA2N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTQ2MzkxMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Madagascar"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001674/","name":"Chris Rock"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001774/","name":"Ben Stiller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001710/","name":"David Schwimmer"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0201509/","name":"Eric Darnell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0569891/","name":"Tom McGrath"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129164/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069464/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0123666/","name":"Mark Burton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1129905/","name":"Billy Frolick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0201509/","name":"Eric Darnell"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0351283, Title: Madagascar, --- Description: Madagascar: Directed by Eric Darnell, Tom McGrath. With Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer, Jada Pinkett Smith. A group of animals who have spent all their life in a New York zoo end up in the jungles of Madagascar, and must adjust to living in the wild." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0351283/","name":"Madagascar","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2I5YzFlYWEtZjRhNy00ZmQzLWJhNTktZGIwYjFjODdmNDgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of animals who have spent all their life in a New York zoo end up in the jungles of Madagascar, and must adjust to living in the wild.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0351283/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"BraveHawk","dateCreated":"2005-06-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"I've Seen Better And Worse. Overall, It Is A Decent Kids Movie That Can Hold Adults Attention As Well.","reviewBody":"Let's face it, it's hard to put out a good animation movie that is equal to Shrek, The Incredibles or Finding Nemo. Those are hard movies to follow but Madagascar is by no means a bad movie. In fact, I will still rate this pretty high, as I enjoyed it without watching the clock.

The plot was very easy for children to follow while not so simplistic that adults become bored in the middle. The simple plot was that 4 animals raised in a zoo venture out into the wild and quickly realize how easy they had it back home in the New York Zoo.

There was quite a few humorous scenes in Madagascar, but my favorite has to be the "distinguished" chimps who get offended that the thought of looking or smelling like a monkey is bad. An honorable mention is the penguins who also got more than they bargained for in Antarctica.

While some of the graphics are sub-par to other movies I've mentioned, like Alex the Lion (voiced by Ben Stiller) for instance. At times they look sort of like clay-mation or something, and other they look positively life-like. The scenery and the lemurs stand out as the most beautifully rendered parts of the movie.

This movie is great for getting the kids out of the house and not too bad if the normal adult wants to get away and enjoy something more suitable for the family as well.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":384163,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2005-07-27","keywords":"zoo,dolphin,talking animal,first part,cgi animation","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Madagascar","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1602270745","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNTQyOTA2N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTQ2MzkxMDI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNTQyOTA2N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTQ2MzkxMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Madagascar","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001674/","name":"Chris Rock","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001774/","name":"Ben Stiller","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001710/","name":"David Schwimmer"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0201509/","name":"Eric Darnell","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0569891/","name":"Tom McGrath"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129164/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069464/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0123666/","name":"Mark Burton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1129905/","name":"Billy Frolick","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0201509/","name":"Eric Darnell"],"duration":"PT1H26M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Stuart Little
Stuart Mali
programme.desc:
Stuart Little: Directed by Rob Minkoff. With Michael J. Fox, Geena Davis, Hugh Laurie, Jonathan Lipnicki. The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0164912/","name":"Stuart Little","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDJlZWZiODItMGE3NC00Yzg3LWFhYTYtZTI2YWNlNjExMDE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA0MjU0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0164912/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TheUnknown837-1"},"dateCreated":"2008-06-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"great family film with a good heart","reviewBody":"Both "Stuart Little" and its first sequel, titled "Stuart Little 2" are two nice little family films that I recommend for their effective blend of drama, adult humor that never goes out of hand, controlled suspense and violence as well as language, and yet it never gets so immature as to become only for the kids. Some critics thought that the movie might have had some moments too intense or unsuited for young children. I was eight years old when I first saw this film and it never bothered me. I was surprised to find swearing in this film, but again, it didn't degrade the film because it was sparingly used and by that I mean it was only used once or twice.

The character of Stuart is very effectively brought onto the screen. The mouse is entirely computer-generated in an efficient way and the contributions of Michael J. Fox's voice work out very well. The same goes for the other animated characters. All of the live-action performances were well-done and they blended in perfectly with the CGI characters.

"Stuart Little" has a good heart and it is can be a very warm little family movie for everybody to enjoy. I still enjoy it nine years after I first saw the film and I do recommend it. It's a film that will suit audience members of all ages. As long as you enjoy family films.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":130441,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2000-03-15","keywords":"alley cat,cat actor,boat,boy,scene during end credits","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Stuart Little","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4253417753","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmU1ODBiZGQtNzRkNy00ODRhLWI2ZjktMjZiZWI0YjYzOWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmU1ODBiZGQtNzRkNy00ODRhLWI2ZjktMjZiZWI0YjYzOWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000150/","name":"Michael J. credits.actor: Christoph Waltz, Jamie Foxx, Leonardo DiCaprio, Kerry Washington, Samuel L. Jackson, James Remar, Don Johnson, Anthony LaPaglia

programme.title: Përtej detyrës
programme.desc: Bazuar në kujtimet e kapitenit Ernest Gordon, vjen historia e katër të burgosurve të Luftës II Botërore dhe e mbijetesës së tyre në kampin japonez, ndërsa detyroheshin të punonin në "Hekurudhën e Vdekjes".
programme.category: Luftë
aksion

programme.title: 14 shpatat
programme.desc: Donnie Yen, Wei Zhao. Në kohën e dinasitsë Ming, një mjeshtër i arteve marciale, agjent në oborrin mbretëror, vihet nën shënjestrën e ish shokëve të tij që e akuzojnë padrejtësisht për tradhti...
programme.category: Kinemaja Aziatike

programme.title: Gjeneza
programme.desc: Viti 2067. Të mbijetuarit e ndotjes globale jetojnë nën tokë në kushte të ç'njerëzore, ndërsa janë rob të pushtetit. Një android krijohet për të ndihmuar me ndotjen, por ai që u ideua si shpresë e njërëzimit, tani, do t'i gjykojë ata.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Heroi
programme.desc: Shume kohe perpara mbreterimit te Perandorit te Pare, grupe kundershtaresh ane e mbane Mbreterise se te Gjashteve, thurnin komplote per te vrare sundimtarin me te fuqishem. Vetem Nje Hero do ta sfidoje Perandorine e do bashkoje kombin.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Lara Kroft-Tomb Raider 1
programme.desc: Angelina Jolie, Jon Voight. Arkeologe bukuroshe dhe e rrezikshme, Lara Croft gjen më në fund një instrument të lashtë e misterioz që ia ka lënë i ati.Tani ajo duhet të gjejë pjesën që mungon e të shpëtojë botën nga një sekt sekret vrasësish.
programme.category: Action Superheroes

programme.title: Legjioni i fundit
programme.desc: Colin Firth, Ben Kingsley, Aishwarya Bachchan. Në ditët e fundit të perandorise romake, një djalosh 12 vjeçar niset në kërkim të legjionit të fundit, i shoqëruar edhe nga një kalorës dhe një plak i mistershëm...
programme.category: Epik

programme.title: Misioni: Hong Kong
programme.desc: ackie Chan, Johnny Knoxville. Detektivi më i mirë i Hong Kongut, bashkon forcat me një kumarxhi amerikan, për të luftuar kundër një krimineli shumë të rrezikshëm.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Profesionisti
programme.desc: Një vrasës me pagesë krijon një aleancë të paparashikuar me një nga objektivat e tij: një vajzë e re që kërkon të hakmarret për vrasjen e familjes së saj.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Qiell i kuq
programme.desc: Cam Gigandet, Shane West. Një pilot avioni i përzënë nga ushtria për diçka që nuk ishte faji i tij, vihet në krye të një skuadre që duhet me çdo kusht të gjejë një armë të shkatërrimit në masë.
programme.category: Action War

programme.title: Mythica:Beteja e Zotave
programme.desc: Në përpjekje të dëshpëruar për të shpëtuar botën nga zombit, një magjistare e re dhe e mallkuar fillon udhëtimin e vështirë për të marrë ndihmën nga perënditë, por armën e vërtetë për të fituar luftën e ka patur gjithmonë me vete.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë

programme.title: Ninxha II: Hakmarrja
programme.desc: Scott Adkins. Kur gruaja e tij shtatzënë vritet në mënyrë çnjerëzore, mjeshtri i arteve marciale, Casey Bowman bashkon forcat me një mik të vjetër për të përsosur aftësitë e tij të dyluftimit dhe për të marrë hak.
programme.category: Arte marciale

programme.title: Sabotazhi
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sam Worthington, Terrence Howard. Anëtarët e një grupi special të departamentit amerikan të antidrogës, fillojnë të vriten një nga një pasi shkatërrojnë një bazë të një karteli droge.
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: I forti i Roud Hauzit
programme.desc: P.Swayze. Xhejms Dalton drejton punën e truprojave në klube. Ai shpejt pranon një punë dhe transferohet në Roud Hauz. Tentativat e tij për të rregulluar gjerat e fusin në konflikt me pasanikun dhe të fortin e qytetit, Bred Uesli.
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: I forti mbi ligjin 2
programme.desc: Danny Trejo, Danny Glover. Veterani i luftës së Vietnamit, Frenk Vega i ndihmuar edhe nga shoku tij, vendos të luftojë krimin në rrugët e Los Anxhelosit.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Loja e vdekjes
programme.desc: 2010. Me Wesley Snipes, Robert Davi . Agjenti sekret Markus është dërguar në Detroit, për të eliminuar një tregtar armësh... Por kolegu i tij, ka plane të tjera.. Tani midis dy agjentëve, do të nisë një luftë e ashpër, për mbijetesë.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Agresioni
programme.desc: Dana Ashbrook, Derek Mears. Një adoleshent me një të kaluar të dhunshme, është mëse i gatshëm të përballet me kriminelët që janë futur në shtëpinë e tij dhe t'iu përgjigjet me të njëjtën mënyrë.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Armiq të betuar
programme.desc: James McAvoy. Ish krimineli Sternud, detyrohet të braktisë fshehjen e tij dhe të kthehet ne Londër, për të vizituar djalin e plagosur. Kjo është edhe mundësia e fundit për detektivin Levinski, që të kapë njeriun që e kërkon prej vitesh.
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Tomb Raider 2-Djepi i jetes
programme.desc: Angelina Jolie, Gerard Butler, Ciaran Hinds. Aventurierja Lara Croft, me ndihmën e një ish marinsi, përpiqet të gjejë kutinë e Pandorës, përpara se ta gjejë një shkncëtar keqbërës, që kërkon dominimin e botës..
programme.category: Action Superheroes

programme.title: Hajdutët e makinave
programme.desc: Ndërsa enden në botën e rrezikshme të vjedhjes së makinave në Los Anxhelos, dy shokë të ngushtë guxojnë të ringrejnë karrierën e tyre pas burgut, duke u kthyer nga hajdutë të vegjël në lojtarë të rëndësishëm të tregut ndërkombëtar të makinave.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Porta e Yjeve
programme.desc: Kurt Russell, James Spader. Një portë misterioze i zbuluar në Egjipt, e çon një shkencëtar dhe disa ushtarë me në krye komandantin e tyre të sertë, në një planet të ngjashëm me Tokën, të sunduar nga alienë të pashpirt.
programme.category: Fantashkence

programme.title: Njerka
programme.desc: Julia Roberts, Susan Sarandon. Drama prekëse e dy grave, njëra nënë e dy fëmijëve dhe tjetra njerka e tyre. Një marrdhënie e trazuar, që ndryshon vetëm kur njëra prej tyre merr lajmin se është sëmurë rëndë.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Kalëruesi i dallgëve
programme.desc: Gerard Butler, Jonny Weston. Historia e 15 vjeçarit Xhei Moriariti që kërkon ndihmën një serfisti legjendar për të kaluar dallgën më të famshme të oqeaneve, Maveriks...
programme.category: Biografi

programme.title: Palo Alto
programme.desc: Emma Roberts, James Franco. Në mungesë të vëmendjes e kontrollit nga prindërit, disa adoleshentë nga qyteza e njohur Palo Alto në Kaliforni, rebelohen ndaj tyre duke përdorur drogë dhe duke përjetuar eksperienca të ndryshme seksuale.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Rregullat e Xhorxhas
programme.desc: Jane Fonda, Lindsay Lohan. Kur sheh se s'ia del dot me të bijën, adoleshente rebele, Lili vendos ta çojë në shtëpinë e nënës së saj, ku ishte betuar se s'do kthehej kurrë. Tri femra krejt te ndryshme, do jetojnë me rregullat e Xhorxhas.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Dallimet që na afrojnë
programme.desc: Greg Kinnear, Renée Zellweger, Djimon Hounsou. Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë te një tregtuesi veprash arti, i cili detyrohet të miqësohet me një njeri të pastrehë, në dukje të rrezikshëm, vetëm për të shpëtuar martesën e tij...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Vrasjet e kartolinave
programme.desc: Jeffrey Dean Morgan, Famke Janssen. Një detektiv njujorkez heton vdekjen brutale të vajzës dhe dhëndrit të tij në Londër. Kur mëson se çifte të tjera në Europë patën të njëjtin fat me ta, ai garon me kohën për të ndalur vrasjet.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Lojë e dyfishtë
programme.desc: Antonio Banderas, Melanie Griffith. Art Dodge, pronari mashtrues i një galerie pikturash bie në dashuri me dy motra. Për t'i dhënë zgjidhje problemit vendos të shpikë vëllanë e tij binjak.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Komikët
programme.desc: Paolo Villaggio Renato Pozzetto. Dy komedianë modestë dhe ngatërrestarë, si për çudi dalin nga ekrani i kinemasë në jetën e vërtetë, por edhe këtu aventurat dhe të qeshurat nuk do të kenë të sosur...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Agjenti sekret
programme.desc: Leslie Nielsen, Nicollette Sheridan. Parodi e filmave të "James Bond". Një agjent sekret i paaftë dhe ndihmësja e tij bukuroshe, përpiqen të ndalin planin djallëzor të një njeriu për nënshtrimin e botës...
programme.category: Parodi

programme.title: Vafsh në djall, Gëte 3
programme.desc: Studentët e gjimnazit Gëte janë gati të diplomohen, por mbarimi i shkollës nuk përkon me përfundimin e telasheve. Kur ata vendosin të rebelohen kundër sistemit arsimor, i mbetet profesorit të tyre të gjejë një zgjidhje...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Çfarë duan burrat
programme.desc: 2019. Taraji P. Henson. Ali Devis është një agjente e suksesshme sporti. Kur i refuzohet ngritja e merituar në detyre, ajo nis të pyes veten se ç'mund të bëjë për të ecur përpara në botën e meshkujve, deri kur fillon të dëgjojë mendimet e burrave.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Dasmë përrallore
programme.desc: 2016. Ricky Memphis, Adriano Giannini, Giorgio Pasotti. Me rastin e dasmës së njërit prej tyre, pesë shokë të ngushtë gjimnazi, takohen 20 vjet pas maturës në Zyrih. Por të papriturat që do t'ju dalin, nuk do lejojnë të argëtohen ashtu sic duan.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Leksione dashurie
programme.desc: Pierce Brosnan, Salma Hayek, Jessica Alba. Beqari i fundit në Angli është i hapur ndaj të gjitha alternativave, deri kur një ditë, planet i prishen përgjithmonë! Ai bëhet baba, e më pas, bie në dashuri.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Gjashtë qesharakët
programme.desc: Adam Sandler. Kur babai i tij i jashtëligjshëm rrëmbehet, Tomi Stokbërn niset drejt Perëndimit në një mision shpëtimi, që do ta njohë me pesë vëllezërit që nuk dinte që i kishte...
programme.category: Komedi
uestern

programme.title: Shoqëruese për Majkun e Dejvin

programme.desc: Ratatouille: Directed by Brad Bird, Jan Pinkava. With Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano, Brian Dennehy. A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0382932/","name":"Ratatouille","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzODU0NTkxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjQ4MzMzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0382932/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"superfan18"},"dateCreated":"2007-06-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent movie!","reviewBody":"Tonight I went to see Ratatouille during a preview offered to Myspace users in Boston. Overall the movie was GREAT! It was really funny, often in unexpected places, the storyline kept you engaged the entire time and the overall mood was lighthearted and inspiring. A real "feel-good" movie. I admit I was a bit skeptical going in, I mean the idea of a rat in a kitchen kind of left me queasy, but I left the theater excited to see it again when it is released. The voice actors are excellent and the animation is amazing. I've been to Paris before and the overall views were very accurate. At times I could tell exactly where in the city the events were taking place. Overall a fabulous movie, I highly recommend it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":675619,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2007-08-22","keywords":"rat,chef,ratatouille,cooking,paris france","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ratatouille","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi906147865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjU0YmUzZTQtZDU4ZS00NWYxLWJlNDMtOWE0ZWIzOGJmODM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjU0YmUzZTQtZDU4ZS00NWYxLWJlNDMtOWE0ZWIzOGJmODM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"CT #2, Post"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004951/","name":"Brad Garrett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0738918/","name":"Lou Romano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0652663/","name":"Patton Oswalt"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0083348/","name":"Brad Bird"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0684342/","name":"Jan Pinkava"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0083348/","name":"Brad Bird"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0684342/","name":"Jan Pinkava"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0135296/","name":"Jim Capobianco"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Pride & Prejudice
Ponos i predrasude
programme.desc:
Pride & Prejudice: Directed by Joe Wright. With Keira Knightley, Talulah Riley, Rosamund Pike, Jena Malone. Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0414387/","name":"Pride & Prejudice","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1NDQ3NTcyOTNeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDA0MzA4MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0414387/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rogerdarlington"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Three weddings and no funeral","reviewBody":"This quintessentially English film is utterly charming - a very traditional interpretation of Jane Austen's 1813 novel that manages to entertain, amuse and even move. First time director Joe Wright has worked with television playwright Deborah Moggach's script and a wonderful collection of mainly British actors to delight us. The versatile camera-work, luscious countryside, grand settings, period costumes, and atmospheric music are evidence of a work on which much love has been lavished.

At the heart of this triumph is the delightful 20 year old Keira Knightley as the assured and sharp Elizabeth Bennett, the second of five daughters looking to be married off by an anxious mother. Knightley's rise in the thespian firmament has been meteoric and this is her best performance to date in a role for which she is perfectly cast. Matthew MacFadyen is suitably brooding and gauche as Mr Darcy, but the cast list is enlivened with splendid British character actors, including Brenda Blethyn as Lizzie's irascible mother, Tom Hollander as a diminutive cleric seeking a wife, and Judi Dench as the formidable Lady Catherine, plus the Canadian Donald Sutherland (Lizzie's wise father).

This is a Georgian world in which social conventions present a veritable minefield for indiscretions or misunderstandings and in which a formal dance can be as intricate an occasion as international diplomacy. Pride and prejudice are only two of the obstacles to be overcome before inevitably true love brings Lizzie and her dark knight nose to nose (we don't even see a kiss). Passionate stuff indeed."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":275936,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2006-05-10","keywords":"pride and prejudice,england,gentleman,bachelor,prejudice","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Pride & Prejudice","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3045130521","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAwOTY1MDktM2IxMy00MTA4LWI4NjEtNWM1ZjNmMWJmMzkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAwOTY1MDktM2IxMy00MTA4LWI4NjEtNWM1ZjNmMWJmMzkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Focus Features"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0461136/","name":"Keira Knightley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532193/","name":"Matthew Macfadyen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000950/","name":"Brenda Blethyn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0942504/","name":"Joe Wright"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042399/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0595738/","name":"Deborah Moggach"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000807/","name":"Jane Austen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000668/","name":"Emma Thompson"}],"duration":"PT2H9M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
Kong: Otok lobanja
programme.desc:
Kong: Skull Island: Directed by Jordan Vogt-Roberts. With Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L. Jackson, Brie Larson, John C. Reilly. After the Vietnam war, a team of scientists explores an uncharted island in the Pacific, venturing into the domain of the mighty Kong, and must fight to escape a primal Eden." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3731562/","name":"Kong: Skull Island","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDg0OGM1NWEtNDEwOC00OTE2LTliZWEtNzg1MTZkNjFlMmNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA4NjE0NjEy._V1_.jpg","description":"After the Vietnam war, a team of scientists explores an uncharted island in the Pacific, venturing into the domain of the mighty Kong, and must fight to escape a primal Eden.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3731562/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Her-Excellency"},"dateCreated":"2017-04-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Completely Entertaining Throughout","reviewBody":"THIS is the way a movie should be done.

Have you ever watched the scene from The Princess Bride where the grandfather tells the kid: It's got everything. "Fencing, fighting, torture, revenge, giants, monsters, chases, escapes, true love ...". Well, in a way, that's this version of KONG, and I am really happy and surprised at just how GOOD it was.

Take a bit of the original Kong, mix it with one part Private Ryan, a dash of The Deer Hunter, some Monty Python, lots of Jurassic Park, a pinch of A Space Oddity and mix well with some (insert your favorite lower-key funny movies HERE). The result is a pleasing fare one can really sink their teeth into and enjoy.

It has some familiar faces too, and what's best about it, is that not only do they live up to their so-called stardom, but even the unfamiliar or not-yet- "famous" actors with smaller roles, really do a great job and sell it. At no time while you are watching this movie do you feel it far-fetched or unbelievable that Kong actually exists, and isn't that, in a nutshell, what all movies should aspire to - the suspension of disbelief? Mission accomplished on this one, and good job to the creators.

A definite must-watch.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":301537,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2017-03-08","keywords":"giant spider,monster movie,giant monster,monster versus monster,pointless self sacrifice","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"4K Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2174206745","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDM5ZWRmOGItNDYwZS00NTY1LTg5YzMtYmRhN2M5Y2I2MTNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFuaW5vc2M@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDM5ZWRmOGItNDYwZS00NTY1LTg5YzMtYmRhN2M5Y2I2MTNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFuaW5vc2M@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1089991/","name":"Tom Hiddleston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000168/","name":"Samuel L. Jackson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0488953/","name":"Brie Larson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3611349/","name":"Jordan Vogt-Roberts"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159111/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0562497/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0319659/","name":"Dan Gilroy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1440919/","name":"Max Borenstein"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2081046/","name":"Derek Connolly"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Argo
Argo
programme.desc:
Argo: Directed by Ben Affleck. With Ben Affleck, Bryan Cranston, Alan Arkin, John Goodman. Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1024648/","name":"Argo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzljNjY3MDYtYzc0Ni00YjU0LWIyNDUtNTE0ZDRiMGExMjZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1024648/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cheche1"},"dateCreated":"2012-10-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good movie but took a lot of liberties","reviewBody":"This is a great movie. The story, acting, pacing, editing, etc. was just fantastic. Affleck's directing was solid, and the suspense will keep you entertained right through to the last seconds. I loved it. 

It did have one irritating thing, though, kind of a big one. It pointed most of the accolades to Affleck's character and the CIA. This really was not true. It was Ken Taylor and the Canadians who really pulled 'the Canadian Caper' off so successfully.

"When Taylor heard a few years ago that Mendez had sold movie rights to his book (which, to be fair, is much more generous than the movie about Canada's role), "I said, 'Well, that's going to be interesting.'...."The movie's fun, it's thrilling, it's pertinent, it's timely," he said. "But look, Canada was not merely standing around watching events take place. The CIA was a junior partner."

"The old postscript sent the message that, for political reasons, Canada took the credit. A sarcastic kicker noted that Taylor received 112 citations. The clear implication was that he did not deserve them."(Sept/Oct., 2012, thestar.com)".

So the USA does another revision on history here. I believe 'Argo' goes this far. Yes, it's based on a true story - the movie does it's best to allude that it sticks to technical accuracy. And it really does, in some ways. Historical pictures of flag burners, rioters, gate climbers, etc.. up against Argo film stills run by during the credits make it seem that the facts were adhered to down to the tiniest detail. In reality, it wasn't Tony Mendez or the CIA who were responsible for the success of this operation; actually they were barely there. 

Since the movie premiered, Ben Affleck has added emphasis on the movie postscripts since then that gives kudos to the Canadians' role. This was after Ken Taylor politely complained, as a Canadian would tactfully do. But Affleck did this only after pressure from Taylor himself.

I can understand the need to spice up events to make them as exciting and entertaining as possible, don't get me wrong. But this film needs to let the audience know that more explicitly than it does, even after the changed postscripts.

Still, a really entertaining and riveting film, very well done, and easily worth seeing. As a matter of fact, don't miss it."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":593452,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2012-11-21","keywords":"iran,hostage,u.s. embassy,escape,american embassy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Winner: Best Picture","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1537319449","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxODY4NDUyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDk1Nzg3Nw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxODY4NDUyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDk1Nzg3Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"As the Iranian revolution reaches a boiling point, a CIA 'exfiltration' specialist concocts a risky plan to free six Americans who have found shelter at the home of the Canadian ambassador. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0186505/","name":"Bryan Cranston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000422/","name":"John Goodman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209646/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0184096/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006516/","name":"Chris Terrio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5410196/","name":"Tony Mendez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2646452/","name":"Joshuah Bearman"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="
